hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

desc: We have been greeted by many warm & friendly staff throughout our 3 day stay. Staff Liya & Samy were exceptionally pleasant & patient in making our stay a memorable one.from the time we checked in to serving us at the breakfast table. We were upgraded to a better suite to allow more playing space for our grand children though they were not staying in with us. Operator Sophia attended to our calls for assistance promptly. A card and a small tiramisu birthday cake was sent to our room. The technician came and quickly fix up the problem we had on the tv. It is these people that shows what good hospitality is like. Well done & a BIG THANK YOU to all! Oh, we enjoyed pushing & slamming on the door to get in & out.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome stayca orchard rendevour
desc: The stay was awesome..location is great!!convinent!!the food was ok..but staff and customer service was awesome!!the club lounge staff was awesome ,for the evening cocktail amd breakfast.Great jon guys!!will sure be back..

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Club room with club benefits
desc: Visited for just a day but its not enough as everything about this hotel is great!!! Location, customer service, room.. And much much more!! Club lounge staff was so awesome!!! For breakfast and cocktail. Did not get the indianady name.. But she made my day for the morningüëçüëçüëçüëç

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation

Anddd hands down to their awesome staff that was nothing but friendly, initiative and prompt, check in and check out was smooth. Kudos to Ms.Liya, Mr.Dixon, Ms.Sofia, Mr, Samy, and Mr.Mario. Thank you guys for the warm welcome you all makes our stay very

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A wonderful and welcoming staycation at Orchard Rendezvous Hotel Singapore
desc: We were attended to by Samy & Sofia at the front desk. They are very friendly, engaging and attentive to our requests. It was a fast check-in. The room we had was clean, big and spacious. Comfortable bed and pillows. We had a good nice sleep. We really had a good swim at the swimming pool. We had a nice walk out of the hotel down to some parts of the orchard road for shopping. Hubby was treated to a delicious birthday cake as our staycation at the hotel was for his birthday celebration. All the hotel staff are very friendly and so professional. All the staff really gave their all, all of them have provided an excellent service indeed!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Extremely pleased!
desc: We checked in on 23/1/2022 to celebrate our anniversary. Really nice surprise to receive a card and chocolates congratulating us! Very happy with the cleanliness and hospitality of the front desk staff. Though the hotel is old it is well maintained and we love the location. Definitely going to book another staycation this year!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Cigarette smell delayed my sleeping time
desc: My family and I stayed from 13 Feb to 25 Feb 2022. On 23rd Feb, when I came back from my shopping trip, the corridor had a strong cigarette smell and my room also had a faint cigarette smell. I opened the balcony door and called the front desk to inform about this. The front desk said they will try to investigate and soon the smell disappeared. But then several hours later, the smell came back. This time I did not inform the front desk because I was honestly lazy. So I just opened the balcony again until the smell totally disappeared. However at around 11pm, just when I was about the sleep, the cigarette smell came again really strong. So I called the front desk. Up to this point, I was seriously annoyed. I knew it was not entirely the hotel fault, if the guest was the one being

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Review
desc: Spacious room, superb fast during the check in and out process. Although the hotel is slightly away from the busy Orchard but still convenient to travel around Orchard. There are some international coffee chains that open till late and also a 7-11 nearby too. Suggestion: To have more Asian choices for breakfast

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore in Covid
desc: Still a great hotel but room for improvement - the covid breakfast wasn't great for a European but overall the hotel has adapted very well in my opinion. If I have one issue its that the hallway lights enter the room at night through the gaps around the door and affected the quality of my sleep.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay and great staff!
desc: I visited this hotel for a short staycation with my mom. The front desk staff Andrew were very courteous and helpful. I stayed at the club room, and was automatically given the benefits of using the club facilities. I had an evening cocktail at the club lounge, and was served by Samy. He was very attentive, helpful and full of personality! Which makes us feels like we‚Äôre dining in at the comfort of our own home. Thank you Samy! For breakfast, we were served by three gentleman‚Äôs at the club lounge too. It was Andrew (same gentleman who served us at the front desk during check-in) and two other gentleman‚Äôs working there. I should have taken note of their names (1st April 2022.) These gentleman‚Äôs are definitely a great asset to the hotel. Thank you so much for making this stay a

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect Location for the price you are paying.
desc: Enjoyed the stay with my young son while i had gotten him vaccinated before returning overseas. The staff were attentive especially Ms Sofia and Ms Mardiana at the front desk who had gone out of the way to help me out. The rooms are quite small but the fact that there is a very small balcony helps for people who like outdoor ventilation to the rooms. Rooms are very clean and the bathroom is sufficient size and clean for the price you are paying. Room service is not great but the fact the hotel is in Orchard Road makes it a heaven for food choices.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The right welcome feeling
desc: I stayed at this hotel for 2 weeks long. Very comfortable accommodations, professional and friendly personal. I have to let a special note to Sofia. She treated me at breakfast. Her care and kindness made me feel relax knowing I was in good hands, giving a genuine feeling of being welcome. Such details make the difference of a good hotel to a great place to be.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Just Wonderful!
desc: I really enjoyed my stay here. The hotel is lovely, very clean and the rooms are spacious, modern and extremely comfortable. The bed is huge and the feather duvet and tons of feather pillows are so luxurious, I slept so well! The shower is great, rain shower with great pressure and heat. The fridge and room facilities were great too, as was the pool. The staff are amazing. Nothing is too much trouble, they go out of their way to make your stay perfect. At the front desk, at the door, the room cleaning staff and in the breakfast restaurant... They were all so polite, friendly and just lovely! A special mention to Sofia, who was so friendly everyday at breakfast was just a pleasure to see and chat to each morning! And Dixon and Loga... Wonderful! Thank you! The location of

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A home away from home
desc: We enjoyed our stay here, just like home away from home. The staffs were attentive especially the dining staffs. We came to morning breakfast alil grouchy and the first person we saw were Sofia and Dixon. Theire smiles could be seen from their eyes (because mask!) and that made my morning. Even before we ordered, we were asked if we wanted any hot drinks to be served first. We really are very very happy with the service. Thank you so much Sofia, Liya, Dixon and Loga! We‚Äôll definitely come back! ‚ù§Ô∏è

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Thank you Orchard Rendezvous
desc: I was warmly greeted by frontdesk team Andrew, Ex & Samy. I gotta thank them for the smooth & pleasant check-in. And Samy came to surprise us later with fruit basket (: Duty manager Suqi for being very kind & replying to my email prior to my stay. She assisted me with my request & attended to it with the best of her ability. Liya & team too for the surprise set up for us. The room was squeaky clean when we came in. It felt fresh & gave us a comforting atmosphere. Thank you to housekeeping ataff Puspa for hthis. The team anticipated that I was gg to come with my baby & prepared a baby cot too. I occasionally come here to take a break & enjoy my time, but this time its extra special as its my baby‚Äôs 1st staycation & he‚Äôs turning 1 soon. We are already having a very good time

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Club room
desc: Great service from Samy from the club room. He was prompt to check what we would like to have for evening canapes when we check in. While we are at the lounge he took initiative to come by once in awhile to ask if we need anything else. Great service from Samy!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Hospitality
desc: We would like to commend the services of the staffs during breakfast. We must say a Big Thank you to Sophia ,Loga and the rest of the team who served us breakfast on the 18th Mar and 19th Mar. They are so dedicated to their job and it was evident from how well they served us . They were just awesome. Thanks to the whole lot of breakfast staffs .

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: My husband booked this hotel for my birthday and it truly exceeded my expectations. The service of the staff is one to highlight as they were warm, very friendly and ready to help. A special highlight to Sofia, Logan & Samy whom served us during the stay. I appreciate their professionalism and for going beyond to check on us always. Their friendliness made us comfortable, and we would definitely return here for another stay.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome staycation
desc: Conveniently located in Orchard Road, with sheltered parking easily accessible and connected to the hotel (complementary coupon provided), this hotel surely has a sterling feel and luxurious atmosphere with the price paid. Checking in was a breeze and the lobby is lovely decorated with quality marble floorings and bright lightings. The Club Room King room is sufficienly spacious for a couple and the view on the top floor is beautiful and airy. The room design surely has a taste or nordic and a modern feel. The swimming pool is decently big and deep enough for long stroll swims and very well kept in maintenance. Breakfast at the lounge was so nice and cosy, similarly to the delicious food. Overall I am very pleased and satisfied with my stay at this hotel and will surely

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Very beautiful and convenient hotel
desc: The hotel is beautifully designed, both on the interior and exterior. The rooms were extremely clean, and i had a balcony facing the swimming pool, which was a lovely sight. You can walk in any direction and you‚Äôll find shopping and restaurants, very conveinient. I highly recommend this hotel, i had the best most relaxing time

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Rendezvous Hotel and Staff
desc: I commend the staff who are welcoming and friendly to their costumers. Mr. Dixon and Ms. Sofia happened to assist us during our stay in the hotel and we can say that they are one of a kind staff. Keep it up! In terms of cleanliness, it was exemplary because of its cleanliness and maintain the room in order.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely place and accommodating staffsü•∞
desc: The room is clean, very comfortable and amzing staffs. They are friendly and welcoming. Special thanks to Mr. Dixon and Ms. Sofia for accommodating us and for making my day extra special. Keep up the good work!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hospitality!
desc: I had my second stay at this hotel and the front desk staff was amazing. He recognized me, which is great as it was my first stay while he's been working there. I really like how much effort they put in to make their customers feel welcome." This small gesture really helped me and made my staycation more enjoyable. Thanks for the great hospitality Shafiq!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Warm Welcome!
desc: I had a great time and experience when I stayed here last time in 2021. Upon checking in, the front office staff, Shafiq remembered me so it felt like I was coming home. He ensured I had a smooth check in and ensured I had a pleasant stay. Thank you for your hospitality, Shafiq.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Old hotel and partially having renovation
desc: No mineral water provided in the 4 stars hotel, told to boil yr own water Breakfast need to order 3 days in advance Cafe was closed down, no cafe in the hotel except 1 private chinese restaurant operate during lunch and dinner Hotel is partially under renovation, no info update in the hotel website

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel in a great location
desc: Hotel is in a very good location, close to transport, shops and retaurants. The hotel itself has 2 good Chinese restaurants. The hotel has a nice spacious lobby entry with lovely ambience. Very helpful staff all round from concierge/porters to a good reception team led by very personable and attentive team leader,Sofia. We had an enjoyablle stay.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing honeymoon
desc: By far one of the best hotels i've been to. Yes the hotel may need some upgrade but the customer service was top notch! I emailed weeks before my wedding, that i would be staying as i wanted to see if there was any package for decorations. Check in was super smooth and fast, was constantly greeted by staff and offered much help. One of the staff, Ms Sofia, came by my room and gave treats to me and my guests and was thoughtful as she saw one was wearing hijab and tried to get something halal for us. She has the most amazing vibe and it would be nice to see her again. Also a big thank you to Mr Shafiq for getting me an upgrade for the room! It was super spacious and comfortable. The pool was great although the minor hassle to switch elevators while the other side is renovating.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Okay hotel has some failings
desc: Clean room, fast check out . That was the best of the stay. Check in took forever, had to go get the luggage trolley myself, and calling to any department on the room phone was impossible given the total short staffed hotel. Staff were doing their best under the circumstances. Location is very good, and it's not a bad hotel but these things let it down so it's definitely not worth the S$300 per night one would pay.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A Good Choice, Value for Money
desc: First.. the room is spacious, as you may know that Singapore has limited space that make everything put in a small space. But, for the rate I got.. this room is spacious. Balcony is the added value that provided for deluxe room. Location is very convenience, at Orchard road that makes me only need to walk to the shopping malls. Bus stop is just opposite. Breakfast is just ok.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good clean comfortable and centrally located
desc: A lovely hotel very well located. Comfortable clean and well maintained. Centrally located with amenities within a 3 minute walk. The housekeeping staff and the front desk manager Shakib are warm and friendly and ensure the guests are treated well.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best Staycation
desc: One of the best customer service that I can ever ask for from Sofia and Shafiq. She greeted me well during check in and tried her best to accomodate to my request. She served me very politely and also a very smooth check in and check out. A must return to hotel. From the service to the room to the swimming pool.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome and friendly staff
desc: It was a short and memorable stay at the hotel. I‚Äôve planned this staycation to celebrate my girlfriend‚Äôs birthday. When the hotel knew that i was celebrating my girlfriend‚Äôs birthday, they offered to decorate the room for us on this joyous occasion. Not only that, they also throw in a delicious lychee cake and wine too. When we arrived at the hotel we were greeted by very friendly staff. Sofia, who upgraded our room for us earlier, brought us to our room. The suite that they gave us was spacious and had a stunning balcony view. There were balloons on the bed, birthday card and some chocolates for the occasion. Shortly after getting us settled in the room, Sofia signaled me discreetly to ask if its time to bring in the cake. I was so satisfied with the room that i almost

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay in the heart of town
desc: Clean room and nice hotel with good location! Nice place and super convenient because it‚Äôs just down the road from orchard area for food and shopping. Lots of places opened till late for food and drinks. Although they were renovating parts of the hotel, which will be completed in Oct 2022, front desk staff Sofia ensured that our check in was very smooth. She ensured we had a nice room with a great view and was always pleasant when speaking to us. Pool was comfortable and clean and great for relaxing! Enjoyed our staycation

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome Customer Service from Cassandra and Yang
desc: Both Sandra and Yang made it intentional to ensure our stay and my team were as comfortable as we could , giving us personalized service that made the stay in Singapore and the meeting experience quite fantastic. I will definitely be back and recommend this hotel !

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Best staycaytion for family
desc: Staff was really helpful and nice- both front desk and housekeeping( esp Ms Sofia from front desk). Got a complimentary upgrade as they were super thoughtful for my baby- Huge room and nice amenities.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice stay
desc: Was warmly welcomed by Mardiana who was very patient upon check in. The room had a outdoor balcony overlooking the pool which provided nice views. Concierge Mario was also friendly and offered assistance. Lounge was a nice place to head to and Samy was extremely friendly. You were able to choose food which came from different ‚Äúsets‚Äù at our point of visit, not sure if it‚Äôs still the same now with the current restrictions. The lounge was well stocked with drinks / coffee / tea so you are able to pop by in the day for a drink. The club rooms also came with breakfast, minibar and late check out. Breakfast at the restaurant was nothing to shout about and portion was abit small. We enjoyed our stay still, nonetheless.!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The hotel is in a convenient location
desc: If you stay here you can get anywhere by public transport.MRT, Taxi,Bus ,You can walk to the shopping mall ,There are many resrestaurants on Orchard road.take no longer than 30 minuits from hotel to Sentosa by MRT.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay was above average.
desc: This place was okay! sadly no bidets. And no separate shower place so... its kinda hard for my mum who has knee injury. Other than that it was all good. Love the airconditioned room! Super cold! And the swimming definitely! Would come here again honestly. It was a surprise for my mum. & it is partially a success.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome staycation
desc: We went there for a family staycation to celebrate Father‚Äôs day. Location and room is great but the swimming is small and currently there is an ongoing renovation. Service is super great especially from the club lounge. Samy and Loga has been really accomodating and provide a superb customer service. I will surely come back for staycation

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Relaxing Break
desc: Even though there are major renovations externally at this hotel, the service was still fantastic and location amazing. Staff go out of their way to accomodate your requests and gave us a late check out so we didnt have to wait around for 5 hours. Will definitely want to go back once renovations are complete. Great Value Hotel and the breakfasts were wonderful.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Average hotel at good location
desc: Singapore is expensive and staying on Orchard Road is even more expensive. This hotel proves just that. Room service starts at 12noon and ends at 8:30pm; Hotel doesn‚Äôt have a single restaurant of its own but there are 3-4 just downstairs. Overall it was an average experience.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Disappointed customer - GYM/POOL HRS and BREAKFAST
desc: Open time 7 AM Close time 7 PM Those times are not good for business visitors!!! I had to be ready to leave by 8 AM to go to work and done with work around 6:45 PM This needs to be adjusted to allow guests to take benefit from the Gym/Pool otherwise its not good at all!!! Breakfast had no items for Plant based vegan people

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice staycation
desc: Check in to the hotel was a breeze within a few minutes and front desk staff was polite. I had booked a club room for my stay this time. View was good from room 1616. It was a pleasant experience at the club lounge. Highly recommended for couples or travellers who prefers to dine in a quiet & cosy environment. Samy and his team mate was very friendly and shown good customer service. Overall, the taste of the food platter was average. Hope the dining team can improve the taste of the pizza.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location and good value
desc: Room is spacious based on Singapore standards. Swimming pool is a bit small. No clear signs about where to have breakfast and front desks are always busy. Didn‚Äôt know hotel will charge for calling in the city which is free in many other cities.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb hospitality and great value
desc: I just want to express my gratefulness to Sofia and her team manager Daniel for their superb hospitality. Room is super nice. Even though i read some reviews that the hotel is old, but i believe they have gone through some renovation. The inside room doesnt leave stinky smell like old hotel usually does and furnishing are great. Trully a great choice to stay here as ion orchard are just 10 mins away. Will be back again next time if we go to SG.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Very strategic location hotel
desc: Nice hotel and excellent service from Sophia and Samuel on the club service. Informative and friendly. Very strategic location in Orchard road with many nice food and restaurants and drinks around. Best all rounder hotels in Singapore. Thanks.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Business Trip
desc: I am a Christian and I love that there is a bible and a verse in the room upon arrival. The staff are great and friendly and extremely helpful, please treat the staff well because they totally deserve it. Despite my repeated ridiculous request but they are still very helpful and attentive to my needs. Excellent staff!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Tentative service and comfortable stay
desc: Hotel is kind enough to upgrade my room to a king bed Shower is hot and water pressure is very powerful Only thing bad side is the aircon is particularly cold for my room, even when I adjusted to low fan and highest temp. I off my aircon during sleep, its still comfortable Housekeeping is fast upon any request as we did not opt for room cleaning throughout the 6 nights stay. Provided enough amenities and bin bags while I dispose the bin to the housekeeping area Only amenity in the room needed change is the ironing board as it is not even Hotel food is ala-carte where there are at least 8 dishes to choose from, buffet sections are juices, coffee machine, tea and bread section. All hotel staff are very welcoming and friendly, many happy faces after the halted tourism

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Totally very good at Orchard Rendezvous Hotel
desc: As my staying at Orchard Rendezvous Hotel during August 2022, my totally image is excellent. the location is good as it is nearby MRT Orchard station. we can walk from Orchard station to this hotel. as its location is at the start of Orchard Road, the ambient environment is tranquil. the room is very clean. the security is very high. the room fee includes breakfast already. the breakfast is not by buffet and by dishes to select. if the volume is not enough. you can order the other dish but not allow to bring out. Nearby this hotel. there are three clubs for night life. very amazing it is.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good stay
desc: Good price for its room size. All required amenities provided and gym opened 24hrs. Pool is decent size but its location is 10 mins from Orchard MRT which can be far when carrying lots of stuffs. Lots of food options nearby including shake shack, coffeebean , McD 24 hr, etc.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful service in a stunning hotel!
desc: The staff at the Orchard Rendezvous were so attentive and thoughtful. The hotel itself is stunning and so romantic with excellent decor and facilities. This was a truly sensational experience in a beautiful place! Highly recommend

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Disappointed
desc: We had a very disappointing experience at this hotel. The problems included: unhelpful staff, they didn‚Äôt answer when we called the front desk from our room (3 different times), when they did answer, they did not fulfill our request, our room door was jammed and required pushing hard downwards on the handle, the wireless internet connection dropped frequently, the included breakfast was marginal at best (wife got a stomach ache), small gym facilities, and our room was old with dated carpets and bathroom facilities. The beds were nice, however! We decided to change hotels midway through our stay.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Location & Customer Service
desc: This was my first visit since pre-COVID. It is my regular haunt due to the excellent location and customer service. I enjoyed another relaxing stay and felt pampered by the attentive staff. I stayed in a very spacious Club Suite with magnificent views and levels of comfort. It was a pleasure to be back again.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: My Experience at Hotel orchard Rendezvous
desc: I have been to this hotel since 2019 more than tweny times. Service is great because they have an exceptional host team specially to mention Liya, Sophiya and Samy . These three staff members are like our family. They go beyond everything to make sure that the guest is properly looked after in their premises . There were instances where they were doing renovations and we didn't feel like visiting the hotel due to disturbance. But these three staff members were very helpful and tempted us to stay in the same property by providing exceptional service. They know the time were arrive at the hotel.
