hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location if you're sightseeing
desc: Very friendly staff and a great breakfast selection. The room was spacious and the balcony was a welcome addition.The swimming pool is lovely but needs more sun loungers and is currently undergoing building work so to access it you have to cross through the lobby. There is also construction work going on around the hotel which you can't hear from inside but is a bit distracting when you are poolside.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect Service and Great Location
desc: We had a great check in and check out experience. The hotel is looking tired but is in the process of an update outside. Met our needs but seemed overpriced for what is currently on offer. Location is good

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Love
desc: I LOVE this place so comfy and clean! Everyone here is the sweetest people ever. Very good customer service. Thank u Sammy and the indian lady that worked on 05/08/22 roughly around 2-3pm at the counter i think Sophia? 10/10 would recommend!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, classical decoration style,
desc: The hotel is located in Orchard road, Singapore‚Äôs most prosperous street. The location of hotel is very great, very convenient to go shopping. The decoration style of hotel is very classical. There is a warm feeling. The environment of hotel is also good.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Host team
desc: We stayed here for three days on our way home to Scotland after visiting our son in Australia. I cannot compliment the host team on the 17th floor enough. Ash,Sofia, Inth,and Dixon. They made you feel so welcome, nothing was too much trouble for them and they helped to make our stay very enjoyable .

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Memorable stay!
desc: I had a recent stay with my wife for her birthday and the service was truly exemplary! Would like to extend my sincere thanks to Sofia, Asraf and Dixon for going the extra mile during the length of our stay to make us feel welcome. Truly unforgettable and we will be back!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: 1st experience
desc: Room are good - spacious, bright & with walk in wall drops. Staff are friendly, helpful & polite. Room cleanliness need improvements. Some power socket are not in function but there are still some others in good function - quantity of socket are good.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent location
desc: The hotel is centrally located, and is close to a bus stop and an MRT station. Plenty of eating and shopping facilities within walking distance. The room was clean and large. Breakfast was included in the package and I could choose from a range of set menus. I did not use the gym or pool; cannot comment on those facilities.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A comfort stay Hotel with very nice environment
desc: Dear all the travelers who have plan go to Singapore for holiday, you can choose Orchard Redenzvous Hotel. This hotel atmosphere is very nice, the staffs are very friendly and helpful, near shopping center that you can easily to visit. Wish all of you have a nice Holiday at there! Good luck!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Short getaway with friends
desc: Had a pleasant experience at Orchard Rendezvous Hotel! Only downside was that there was no bidet in the toilet. Other than that, room was clean and staff was always ready to render assistance. Was served by the helpful Mr Sao Kimsang. Hoping to extend my stay the next time I‚Äôm back ‚ó°Ãà

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Welcoming and helpful staff.warm and friendly
desc: I enjoyed staying in the hotel and surely next time I visit Singapore I will book again .i liked how friendly the staff are .the water temperature in the showers were cold specially early morning .the cleanness is not too and the cleaners only did the bed while left everything else untidy in the room which not what I expected .

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay
desc: Staying at Orchard Rendezvous was a great experience. It is a great location - plenty to do in the area and a great central base from which to explore. But most of all, Sofia, Ash and Sammy in particular are so kind thoughtful, professional and respectful. Cant recommend enough.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staff customer service compensated for the work in progress renovations
desc: when I booked the stay, I had no idea they were renovating. Upon arrival, it can be seen from outside that they were doing some renovation works. To be honest, the renovations were quite unsightly and I was a little disappointed. However, the room was nice and clean. Temp was way too cold to be 25 degrees though. I went to the gym and it was clean and sufficient. I liked the overall customer service from check in to check out. The staff were nice and polite. Breakfast at White Marble was nice and relaxing. Though I must comment that the waitresses seem to be in a rush to serve us. I did not feel very welcomed to be honest. It seemed like just a job to them. Not sure if it was because we were locals? I happen to see a female waitress being quite rude to another customer (non

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation:)
desc: Had a short but pleasant staycation with my friends. The room is big and spacious for 4 pax, suitable for family trips but it would be nice if there was a bidet! We are all very thankful for the staff, Mr Sao Kimsang for being very accommodating to all of our requests. Hope to come back here again!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: wonderful staycay
desc: had a wonderful stay at Orchard Rendezvous Hotel over the weekend. the staff was friendly and was grateful to have been served by Mr Sao Kimsang. the room was clean and spacious, wish there was a bidet too :( overall, good stay and would definitely come back again.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation with friends
desc: The hotel was very accommodating to our last minute changes. Staff was very helpful and friendly. The room was spacious and clean. The location was also easily accessible to the other malls in orchard. Big thank you to Mr Sao Kimsang for helping us through out our stay!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Central Location
desc: If you are looking for a convenient, clean and affordable location, the Orchard Rendezvous is for you. Room was clean and well stocked with amenities. Very close to Orchard shopping area- a short 6 minute walk.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good and will come back
desc: Nothing to complain about this hotel. Room was perfect with comfy beds and good hot shower, breakfast was amazing, service was impeccable. The manager Andrew was very professional and helpful throughout our stay. Will definitely come back again.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Satisfied experience
desc: I travelled and stayed at the hotel for business plus leisure. The hotel is centrally located and is easily accessible with various travel modes. I am humbled by the services provided by Sofia , Soon Fei and their entire Team. I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Singapore.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location walkable from MRT
desc: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel is at good location that can be walkable from MRT Orchard (around 500 meters) and location is not far from shopping street, Orchard Road. Hotel cleanliness is exceptional. Staffs have a great service mind.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Short stay
desc: Overall very satisfied. The location is great for easy access to shops and close to the Botanical gardens. Nice but small gym and a lovely large rooftop swimming pool that was very clean and plenty of towels available

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Bad Treatment
desc: Very disappointed this time. I stay for more than a year all together; this might be the last time. First you extend the room rate because of F1 to an unacceptable level, even for long term guest, then you kick me out without any further notice because "Fully booked", so I have to pack everything and look for another place to stay. According to your Manager, no way to extend or waiting list.My company send a message to you and then, miracle, I can stay in the same room for the same rate. This is not how you treat your long-term loyal guest. In the furture, I try to stay at another place

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely lounge experience
desc: What a wonderful experience, such professional staff, I really enjoyed my time here. The food was awesome, the poolside was missing service, other than that, great. Special thanks to Samy and Ash, unbelievable kindness on display in the lounge of the hotel.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: my great singapore stay
desc: great hotel location, nice staff, clean room. I love Orchard Rendezvous They were extremely accommodating and allowed us to check in early. We got to hotel super early, So this was a big plus. The sevice (frontdesk and the breakfast resto) was exceptional as well. Would definitely recommend Orchard Rendezvous hotel to family, relatives and friends back in manila.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay
desc: It was lovely. Very convenient and nice . The staff were so nice. The room was comfortable. It was an easy 5 minute walk to the tram and so close to the city. Breakfast was really nice and my grandsons loved the choices of food.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service staff ! Made our stay awesome !
desc: All the service staff gave us great service throughout our staff of 6 days ! It was a big group of us and they managed very well.. from special request of our VIP CEO room and more :) Arranged and amend our bus transport and special prepacked breakfast for our event day Special thanks to Andrew and Sufian for all their help on some hiccups but they fixed it anyhow .. truly appreciate them and also the all pakciks at concierge for helping with luggage delivery and more. Would definitely recommend them to anyone coming to SG Also on the side note the location is really good - hungry just go to the restaurants nearby - just beside and it‚Äôs there. Breakfast at the White Marble is great too

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing service
desc: The hospitality is one of a kind here at Orchard Rendezvous. The staff are well equipped to handle all their customers making it easy to deal with! And the breakfast is to die for! Although it‚Äôs not buffet but it‚Äôll definitely be enough for you! Will definitely come back next time!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: First class hotel
desc: We stayed at the Orchard Rendezvous for 2 nights on our way back to New Zealand. Our first impressions were ‚Äúwow‚Äù, what a beautiful extremely clean and tidy hotel, secondly we we greeted (after a long flight from the UK), by wonderful caring staff who welcomed us both. We were upgraded to a Club Room and to be honest, this was outstanding. Exceptionally clean and very modern. We were both well impressed. Breakfast was also outstanding with quantity and quality. There was absolutely nothing to fault here, although room service was a bit slow. Top marks to the owners, management and staff throughout.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great mini break
desc: Perfect place to stay for mum and daughter get away. Great location, close to MRT and shops, pool and gym were appreciated at the end of a hot day, really good custom service all round and would be our first choice to stay for a return trip to Singapore

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A few days stopover sight seeing en route to Australia.
desc: Had a fantastic time! Hotel was immaculate and staff amazing! Special mention to Ash and Samy and everyone else in the Club Lounge where service was beyond excellent. Would highly recommend this hotel and also the upgrade to the Club Lounge too as it really was exceptional value. Thanks again for a great and memorable stay on our way to Australia x

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: We stayed for 3 nights while enjoying the city. Great location near the Orchard MRT with plenty of places to shop and eat within a few mins walk. I used the gym once which was pretty good for a hotel set up - treadmills, cross trainer, multi gym and good to have some free weights and bench too. We did not use the pool but it looked nice and is located on floor 6 near the gym. The room was clean and spacious with a fridge and a massive comfy bed. Hot water took a while to come through but what‚Äôs the rush?! Staff were very friendly and helpful. Could not fault anything.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience
desc: Excellent customer service, especially Mr Samy who is very helpful and friendly. The room is clean and spacious. International charger is provided, which is very considerate for the hotel. Pillows are a little too soft though.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wedding Anniversary Celebration
desc: We are overall satisfied with the experience and will revisit again in future. Hope to utilise the Swimming Pool and Gym during our next visit. Hope to have Express Check out option in future. House of some of the best cuisine within Hotel Vicinity

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Very elegant hotel
desc: The location is very appropriate, the reception is unique. Also the cleaneliness and tidiness of the room is applausable. The pool is very quiet and clean. Looking forward to coming again and staying im there, but this time with breakfast!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Such a great experience!
desc: From check-in to check-out, our entire group was looked after and cared for, everyone was so willing to assist us no matter the request. A wonderful experience, the rooms are lovely, clean and comfortable. I would definitely use them again.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel
desc: Lovely hotel in an excellent location near a shopping area with different brands and nice food places . Clean hotel with excellent service. Very hospitable staff. I recommend it to those visiting Singapore.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A nice and convenient place to stay
desc: One of the very best location in town. It's very easy to live n Singapore when you stay there. Best restaurants, mall, botanic gardens are at walking distance. With a little renovation of the lobby and the bar, that would be better

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable and clean
desc: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for 4 nights. It was dated but very spacious and comfortable. Even though renovations were under way within the hotel it was kept clean and tidy. The pool was refreshing and large but noisy due to renovations. The staff were friendly and polite especially David who worked at the bar. If you like shopping there are many opportunities on Orchard Road to do so. Many restaurants and eateries are at hand with regular buses to choose from. We enjoyed our stay at this hotel.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay enhanced by the great staff.
desc: Can't fault our stay in this hotel but what really made it an enjoyable stay were the staff starting with a warm friendly welcome right through the stay until our departure the staff always had time for a chat, some good advice and answered all our queries. A big thanks to Ash & Dixon who looked after us in the Executive Lounge nothing was to much trouble for them. Its location at the end of Orchard Road was perfect a short walk to the MRT Station and lots of shopping malls in the area. Lots of restaurants to choose from including several in the hotel itself can highly recommend TungLok Signatures. Breakfast in the White Marble restaurant was different in that it was a fixed menu and not a buffet there were dishes on the menu to cater for many nationalities and were made to

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: Very impressed with all the staff(especially Ash, Sofia, Dixon and Samy) at Orchard Rendezvous Hotel Singapore . All staff are friendly and made us welcome at all times. Will recommend to all our friends to stay at this hotel.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Last time I'm staying here...
desc: So I'm all for hotels taking an environmental stance, but when this stance is imposed on the guest then it's hard to see it as anything less than a margin grab. No bottled water in the room - just a sign saying 'Singapore water is great so drink that and be happy'. Now I know the water is good quality in SG, but the pipes at this 50 yr old hotel and the cleanliness of the glasses in the room etc, these are a complete gamble. Sure enough the water tastes steely. So I ring Room Service (at 9:30pm) and nobody answers. So then I try front desk and I'm finally told that the hotel doesn't sell water. (But it does sell Coke, Sprite, Beer etc which are 95%....yep, water) I would have gone down to the bar, but when I walked past at 9pm it was closed. Great. Cupboards and wardrobe

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A memorable stay
desc: Hi Firstly I would like to thank the front office staff Keilli who was extremely good in customer relations. She was very pleasant, polite showed some extra efforts to make our stay a wonderful one. I will certainly recommend this hotel to my friends and family.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Simply outstanding
desc: As a returning guest to Orchard Rendezvous, the friendly atmosphere is recognizable already by arrival outside, and certainly when entering and meeting all the friendly, and for me, familiar faces. I was recommended Orchard Rendezvous (then Orchard Parade Hotel) ahead of my first visit to Singapore 14 years ago, and with the outstanding hospitality and friendliness the Team delivers every visit, I see no point staying elsewhere in Singapore. Orchard Rendezvous is my Singapore home. Upon my last visits, it‚Äôs necessary to mention Ex, Ash, Sofia, Samy & Thava, for making it another memorable visit. Thank you all üôèüèª

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Trip to Singapore
desc: The hotel location is very good, city centre and 10min from MRT station. The pool is large and nice rest areas. The gym could have more machinery but acceptable. The room is large and always very clean. The reception staff very helpful and friendly (Sofia, Dixon, Samy).

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Special requests met, good housekeeing
desc: Had a good stay overall. Prior to my stay, I emailed the hotel with some specific room requests and was promptly acknowledged by Andrew, the duty manager. My requests were all met at check in, which made all the difference and was a great plus. We enjoyed the pool area, and views from the balcony. Housekeeping was also prompt in delivering some extra items that I requested. Special mention to the 2 gentlemen that cleaned our room, they did a great job in keeing the room clean and neat, and remembered to replace extra towels without being asked. Some areas for improvement: 1) bedsheets have some stains on them 2) concierge/doorman are not the most attentive 3) baby crib size was too small for my toddler and the mattress was too hard

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation @Orchard Rendezvous Hotel
desc: Check in was fast and smooth. Room is so comfortable, spacious and clean, except that there is no good window view as it is facing a multi storey car park. Bath tub is delightfully relaxing to soak in and the washroom is brightly lit and spacious. Counter staff and bell boy are helpful and friendly. Location is also good as it is at the fringe of Orchard Road, far from the madding crowd, yet easily accessible. Fleurato caf√© at lobby also serves delicious gelato and plant based meals. It was just such a relaxing and memorable staycation here!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Luxury hotel in a luxury location
desc: Loved your hotel. Staff were very helpful. Location is perfect, lots of shopping malls within walking distance and close to Orchard MRT. Wifi was strong. Room was spacious and the large bed very comfortable with a balcony overlooking the pool where bath towels were provided so no need to pack your own.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good stay in Orchard Road
desc: This hotel is located just at the start of Tanglin and Orchard Road. The strategic location makes it a great place to stay if you plan to stroll along the road till Ion Orchard, 313 Somerset , etc. Breakfast (A La Carte) is nice and I am missing their breakfast that has salmon option. It will be better if the breakfast has slightly bigger portion. Bathroom can be improved as most of the fittings/ tools are quite old and corroded with smaller water volume from shower. After all, it's still a pleasant stay as the bed is very comfy.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Very bad service, cleanliness in pool and very bad quality
desc: Room was ready for interconnecting rooms. tiles on pools were broken and guest got injured. when check in the pool were "unexpectedly close". No room service after 8pm and no meals served in pool as well, only drinks. So kids do not get to enjoy the pool and snacks. Not friendly as a business or family hotel.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Orchard Rendezvous
desc: Overall hotel was clean, staff very friendly and helpful. Rooms facing Ming Arcade encounters loud music till 3am when there is entertainment. Something need to be done. Double glazing of glass panels may solve the problem.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: 5 Star Service
desc: I really enjoyed my stay with my friend and would visit again in the near future.. Love the christmas tree at the lobby! Very nice hotel with superb staff. Special mention to Kim Sang for his impeccable service üëçüëç

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely place to stay
desc: Very clean and superb staff when we had a change of flight very helpful to get us packed up and catch a cab to the airport, let us print visas out and even on our first night gave us a free complimentary sightseeing bus tour which made us feel very Christmassy.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great places to stay
desc: Stuffs r friendly and great location to explore orchard~ will definitely come back again~ everything was great~ all my family members love it~ glad that we stayed here throughout our holiday~ we have a good memories here.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: good location comfort and facility ok
desc: location and level of comfort/ facility is good to make sense. second time i stay and get appreciating the location. more and more. i like the gym on top floor, eventually ( not time yet the swimming pool ). wifi stable. i was able to adjust the ac since i prefer it low/to moderate. innovatice and ecological water bottle.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: Good location.. nice view. Great food.. Kind staffs.. I will definitely book Orchard Randezvous Hotel again for my next business travel. It would be much better to provide water for customers. Overall, I'm satisfied with your service

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: It was my first trip in 3 years with two male friends.
desc: I got an upgrade and stayed in room 1501. The view was good and the room was clean and beautiful. It was a comfortable stay. The location was good because it is a hotel around Orchard Road, but it may be inconvenient because it is a little far from the station. It's right next to the Hard Rock Cafe, so you can hear the music at night, but it didn't bother me that much. I will definitely use it next time. We look forward to seeing you next time. As a request, it was a pity that there were no tables or chairs at the hotel entrance or lobby. I'm tired of standing around waiting for my friends.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Family Staycation
desc: Had the best staycation and family gathering during the Chinese New Year Period. We was serve by the front desk by Mr Suffian whom check us in with great smiles and even jokes with the kids.. He told us to wait awhile and then came out from his counter and gave my kids ice cream which they enjoyed. The pool is great and as parents we are able to monitor while the kids enjoyed their swim. Our request for ice bucket was delivered less then 10 mins. We will definitely return for our next staycation and will recommend to our family and friends. Kudos to the management üëè

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Expect long queue at check-in, slow service, missing shipment
desc: That's all we had for this time we stayed. Was not impressed. We called to request for bathroom with no tub as our father is traveling with us and the reservation said our room type is with shower room already. Checked in, took 15 minutes. Front desk agent was not eager to help. Some were just walking in and out of the counter, not offer help or opening new line. We entered the rooms and got bathtub. The room was also smaller and in lower floor, though we booked the higher room type comparing to last time we stayed. The hotel could not find shipment of ours til Sunday 6am they delivered it. Fridge was not working

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A tired hotel with average staff and bad plumbing
desc: A great location, but that's about it. Our bathroom was a nightmare. No hot water for a day and a half, despite us asking. Then the toilet didn't work. Night staff don't answer calls so you have to go downstairs. And when you do, I received some of the rudest behaviours from a guy called "Ex" that I've ever had in a hotel. It wasn't my fault that the toilet didn't work or that they couldn't fix it. The bathrooms need a refurb anyway. Lots of cracked tiles and black mould on ledges. I would suggest people find someone else to stay. This place needs to train its staff and spend some money on the building. But, the guy who looks after your luggage was lovely, as was the maintenance guy who spent nearly 2 hours attempting to fix our toilet. They were the only good staff members. It

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: WE WILL RETURN
desc: We stayed 4 nights prior to embarking on Holland America Westerdam cruise ship. The room was comfortable and quiet - essential for me a poor sleeper. The staff were professional and helpful -The front door porter willingly assisted with questions and directions. Convenient location for MRT access and wide variety of shopping.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Value
desc: Nice hotel pleasant good surroundings room was in good condition‚Ä¶.had a balcony but warning sign not to open door‚Ä¶.no idea why. Bar closed at 11 which wasn‚Äôt great. Hotel was a little way out from main attractions but good transport links if you can navigate them.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Thank you, Orchard (and Jacqueline!)
desc: We had an amazing time at Orchard Rendezvous. We slept so well in our comfortable beds (I need to get the name of the pillows they use) and the hotel is centrally located in Singapore, right outside some of the best shopping the city has to offer. The best thing about this hotel, though, is definitely the staff. Everyone there was so polite and accommodating, but Jacqueline went the extra mile. She knew us by name, checked in on us whenever she saw us, shared amazing recommendations for restaurants and attractions, and was just a joy. We cannot thank her (and the rest of the hotel staff) for making our stay so memorable. I would also be remiss if I didn't mention the amazing sushi restaurant inside the hotel, Unkai Sushi. It was the best food and sake we had while in Singapore

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay,fantastic service
desc: We booked this hotel by ourselves and were really impressed with it. It has a modern take on an old fashioned hotel both in quality of surroundings , cleanliness and service. To get the best from the hotel ,book a club room on upper floors. Gives access to the club lounge and many extras including fantastic service from Ash, Samy and Jea. Worth the extra cost.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Book a club room
desc: Excellent hotel in every way except for the breakfast experience which did not do justice to the rest of the service. The club room deal was very worthwhile and the staff here were especially friendly, helpful and generally delightful people. Especially we‚Äôd like to thank Ash, Samy, Jea and Darvin.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good
desc: The employees where very friendly. Expecially Ash, Siamy and Jea. The Hotel has a nice Pool and a good Service. The Lounge was quiet and good to take a Drink or eat something. The food was very tasty.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel, excellent club lounge staff, wonderful location
desc: It was my first visit to Singapore where I felt lucky to be in this hotel. One of the positive things about this hotel were the wonderful staff in the club lounge whose communication skills were marvellous. They were full of smile and their services were awesome. I must particularly mention Ash, Sam and Jea whom I will never forget. Breakfast was terrible and the crowded breakfast area looked like a prison dining place. Housekeeping was excellent. The rooms were spacious but furniture were ancient looking. If I want to come back to this hotel it will only be because of the location and the services in the club lounge.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel and location
desc: My 02 nights in Singapore and location was great , staffs were very good and helpful Staying in a new wing room. Hence it was new and clean. Breakfast was just Okay that ‚Äòs why I gave 04 * instead Small restaurant and no sofa in the lobby the. we need to stand too long to wait when the room is not ready

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel Singapore
desc: Excellent service by Thava at reception. Perfect customer service and was extremely happy to seek his advice during our stay. David at the bar was not only a font full of knowledge of where to go, he also made the best singapore sling. These guys made our stay just that more enjoyable.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable and convenient!
desc: When we booked this Hotel we did not realise how well it was positioned to all the delights of Orchard Road, it was so convenient. The hotel staff were very helpful and efficient. The large pool and surrounding area was very relaxing, there could have been a few more lounges. Breakfast had good variety and was delicious.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay. Convenient Location.
desc: Located just off the crowded Orchard Road area and yet it is near enough to walk there. Room is clean and spacious. Staff are friendly and helpful. Food is lovely and fresh. It will definitely be one of my top choices if I need a hotel room in the city area.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable, spacious and relaxing stay.
desc: Large Club room with two balconies. Excellent AC in the room, Great shower pressure. Good pool area which could do with a few more sun loungers. Being at the end of Orchard road there are loads of food and shopping options within easy walking distance. The staff was professional and well-presented.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: An excellent stay.
desc: Lovely stay at the Orchard Rendezvous - staff members Jea and Ash in the executive lounge were particularly welcoming. The check in staff gave us a room upgrade, very kindly, without us asking and we had the most amazing room with a great view and very generous bathroom facilities, as well as an extremely comfortable bed!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A very pleasent and excellent visit to Singapore.
desc: Our visit was very nice with alot to experience from Singapores history till todays multi cultural society. The excellent museums gave a informative view on how it all started uptill today. All the food and cultures is interesting to experience as well. The efficient way to use buses and subways is also a strong positive experience.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, service average
desc: The check in experience wasn‚Äôt great with a room assigned that was the category below what we had booked and had a blind window. Since I booked for my friends and wasn‚Äôt present at check in, I had to ask for a change of room. It felt that my friends had been taken advantage of because their English wasn‚Äôt very good and they were clearly foreign tourists; not a good feeling. Not a lot of help from the staff for foreign travellers

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel in a great location with balcony
desc: I enjoyed my stay. Especially the balcony is great, unfortunately no chairs or table on the balcony. Bath is a bit to dark. Size of room is perfect, bed is comfortable. Breakfast to poor. Staff very friendly

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing trip
desc: I am really enjoyed my business trip at ramadhan 2023, 28-30 march 2023. From Changi i go to the Orchad Rendezvous hotel by MRT and then by walk i was looking for the hotel and you know i think the hotel located at Orchard road, apparently at Tanglin road üòÅ 12.000 steps

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Very comfortable hotel and great location
desc: All is easy to reach especially with the good Singapore MRT stations nearby. The rooms a very good size, comfortable, clean, the service level high. We liked the small balcony and enjoyed a good view from 15th. floor.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, great service!
desc: Location was very convenient as it‚Äôs along orchard road! We came earlier & was greeted warmly by I believe the duty manager Andrew(?) He had kindly given us an early check in as my son was sleeping & was very informative about the restaurants around the area. Will definitely come back next short staycay!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: be cautious
desc: whilst theroom was plesent - the pre-occupation clean could have been much better - glass doors cleaned from outside only - when against wall - if you close door you see he rubbish stuck to door and mess - chair in room was unsafe and broken - fridge did not get anything cold - food we had went off due to warm frisge - oterwise staff wereplesent if you get a package avoid White Marble for Breakfast - it is a disgrace

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice staff and good location
desc: Our room was in a club room and we enjoyed it the whole day even cocktail hour. The bed was comfy and pillows as well. I was worried when checking in 6am in the morning but they allowed us to get room . The staff of lounge mr.Samy and Mr.Ash are very nice staff up there.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Weekend Getaway!
desc: My friend and I decided to go to Singapore for a short trip. We booked Orchard Rendezvous. We were checked in by a very friendly staff, Andrew the Duty Manager who greeted us with a warm smile. He was very helpful in recommending place to eat and visit while we were here that made our trip much more enjoyable! The room was comfy enough for our short trip. Will come back again! :)

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay and great service!
desc: We had such a pleasant stay at level 17 at Orchard Rendezvous. Great room, nice breakfast, relaxing club atmosphere and a very helpful and great service by Ash, Samy and Jea. Thank you so much for the great stay!!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Standard medium range hotel at top of Orchard Rd
desc: Standard medium priced hotel - check in is efficient but no seating in lobby. Room as spacious by Singapore standard but decor a little jaded. Bathroom clean and OK. Exec lounge has happy hour. There is a pool but I never had time to use it. Breakfast is unusual with a set list of meals which limits choice. No real buffet as such, so lacked choice of fruit and yoghurt

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation!
desc: I came down from Malaysia with my boyfriend and we wanted to book a hotel in the Orchard area, so we decided to book this hotel. I find the location of this hotel very convenient! Special thanks to the Duty Manager Andrew for taking care of us and for your great hospitality during our staycation. Will recommend this hotel to my friends and family!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: First class service
desc: We have stayed in many hotels in Singapore, we are here now and the service, cleanliness, rooms, location is perfect. The added benefit is having a club room and the best staff ever, sam, jea and ash welcomed us when we arrived and haven‚Äôt stopped looking after us since. We are looking forward to the rest of our stay.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience
desc: Everything just perfect.. strategic location in orchard area , near to shopping place , seven eleven , shakeshake , starbuck , etc . Breakfast just so perfect . Room clean and bed so comfort . Definitely back here

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Orchard Rendezvouz Hotel Birthday Celebration
desc: I have the most wonderful experience at Orchard Rendezvous Hotel, Miss Diana was such a wonderful and bright woman! She wishes me happy birthday even though I didn't tell anyone, it surprise me abit and made my day even more special. She answered my questions in a nice and calm tone, and patiently guide me to my room. I was greeted by a nice gentlemen named Samy, Ash, and Jea. Upon entering my room, they surprise me with a happy birthday song and a cake! It was adorable! Overall I have a wonderful birthday celebration at Rendezvous üíñ Thank you to all the staff!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location but not value for money
desc: The hotel is in a good central location with good access to shops, restaurants, metro and of course the botanic garden. Internet access was poor/non existent. It would have been nice to have had a table and chairs on the balcony. Room was clean but could have been better stocked with bathroom products. In the end we used our own. Other hotels in the group have been a lot better in this respect.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely, central and friendly
desc: The hotel is great with friendly, helpful staff and is close to public transport. The breakfast is nice although a bit more variety would be nice. The beds are so comfortable and the room a good size.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing Stay Except Breakfast and Airconditioning
desc: Superb property in the best location you could ever ask for on Orchard street. Staffs are very welcoming and extremely friendly. We encountered 2 unsatisfactory experience - Breakfast and air conditioning.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Look for a better option
desc: I have stayed at this hotel multiple times before when it was called orchard parade. The hotel and the management has changed drastically. We were there 3 days. The breakfast is v sad. Its american breakfast not buffet which they used to have earlier. There is not a single sofa or a chair at the reception to even sit down one has to go sit at their bar. I have never seen any hotel in the entire world which does not have a seating arrangement in the lobby. We had to change our rooms thrice because of poor views and space. The rooms dont have any complimentary water bottles. You are encouraged to drink water from the tap or buy you own. The location is the only saving grace about this hotel now. Which is frankly a long walk from the other shopping malls. Make better choices.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation @Orchard Rendezvous Hotel
desc: This is my 5th staycation here and as usual, it was a pleasant one. The superior room is clean, spacious and comfortable with a nice tub to relax in. The swimming pool is another great place to relax and enjoy peacefully. I also enjoyed the gelato at Fleurato. Will be having my next birthday staycation here again next month!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel, unfortunately not very good or Excellent!
desc: The front desk staff was very helpful, but had far too little knowledge of Singapore sights and could not help organize excursions. The only thing that worked perfectly was calling cabs. The breakfast room was very small, you often had very little space when getting coffee and pastries. The staff was hectic and did not give personal attention, you often had to avoid someone. There was no convenient storage for clothes in the room. The closet door was extremely awkward and you could hurt yourself closing the door (crushing your fingers on the folding door). There was no seating on the balcony which was a big disadvantage.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect hotel for long stays
desc: I stayed two weeka at the Orchard Rendezvous on a business trip and I felt like at home. The excellent breakfast and the personable staff at White Marble were definitely a highlight of my stay. The swimming pool area is very nice also. The room was serviced very well every day.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A model for outstanding hospitality
desc: We stayed at this hotel for 5 weeks from April 3, having previously stayed here for 3.5 months when our apartment was under rennonation. Not surprising as it always feels like a home away from home. The warm and welcoming atmosphere is instantly felt and it will make you feel like part of their family. There is a culture of love and care here and everyone from the bellhop to the GM is extremely friendly, genuine and helpful. Service was so anticipatory; as we were checking in after my wife's discharge from hospital, they anticipated our every need and got a wheelchair and a shower chair ready for her use. They even provided clean plastic sheets, sticky tapes anda pair of scissors to ensure that my wife kept her surgery area dry. Such thoughtful gestures really touched us.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good place to stay
desc: Very nice people: Sofia and Samy. I have stayed many times at this hotel and I shall always return. It is like home far from my home. This survey asks me to use minimum 200 characters. If I appreciate something I do not need to use many words.....

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfectly located at orchard road
desc: Nice hotel, located at orchard road next to a lot of malls with great food and shopping experience close to mrt station, nice outdoor pool, Overall all staff very friendly Rooms are clean and with enough space for two

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience with great staff
desc: Great Hotel to stay around orchard with competitive price. I had several options of Hotel which most of them either in clarkquay or away from orchard/central. The Hotel rooms in singapore are also mostly extremely small. Orchard rendezvous is a proper size hotel, which excellent location and excellent breakfast. Highligly recommended.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect experience in Rendezvous hotel
desc: It‚Äôs really a memorable experience in Rendezvous hotel! A good position and nice environment! Beautiful environment and professional services here! And I wanted to take a few moments to express my heartfelt appreciation for the exceptional service provided by club lounge during my recent stay. Ash and Samy are very professional and patient, and they help me a lot. As well Dixoh, Jea, Julius are very nice and kind. All of your warm hospitality, attention to detail, and genuine kindness were truly remarkable, and made me stay all the more enjoyable. From preparing delicious meals to providing helpful recommendations on local attractions, your dedication to ensuring that I had a comfortable and memorable experience. Please know that your hard work and commitment to guest

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly and Helpful Staff
desc: We had a pleasant stay. The staff are very friendly and helpful especially Thava (front desk), He gave us room with best view. Made us comfortable stayed for 2 weeks. Definitely will always come back again ! Strategic location close to ION Orchard and Gleneagle Hospital

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommended
desc: First I would like to thank the reception staff for allowing us to check in early after a long flight. The hotel is clean and has good breakfast options to choose. I don't remember the name. but one staff( working in the restaurant) even gave gifts to my kids. They loved it

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Top Staff Service in Club Lounge
desc: The staff service in the club lounge was excellent. From the moment i came in, Jea and Julius took care of us and even helped us with the SIM card problem that we have. The following night, Sofia, Sammy and Dixon also maintain the same standard set by the two. Overall i'm really happy with how the staff manage to handle the problems such as lack of breakfast options in the club lounge and repetitive if youre staying multiple nights. Overall, very nice club lounge, clean room, excellent staff service but lacking in the breakfast options

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Very nice hotel and very comfortable
desc: We stayed at suite room and the room was very clean and spacious. Pillows and bed was great. AC was kind of noisy, but after long flight we didn't notice it. Club lounge was very delicious meals even not much choice,soft drinks and snacks were many choices. The staffs mr.Samy and Mrs.Sofia were very helpful and very kind us, they are the best.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: This is my first time to stay at the hotel. Very happy and look forward to stay again in the future. God Bless.
desc: The guys, samy, sofia, dixon are very nice and helpful. The are always offering help what we need. The room we are staying clean and smell good. However, the air condition somewhat noisy. Probably need to look and to be fixed.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Club Room Value for Money!
desc: Got the Club Room. Room was spacious and had everything I needed. Lounge was nice! Was able to get work done comfortably. Staff was very attentive to my needs. Special mention to Samy, Sofia and Dickson who were extremely friendly. It was a very value for money stay. Exceeded my expectations in many ways. Will be back again!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Professional service by Samy
desc: The gentleman named Samy provided perfect service at the Club Lounge on 17/F of the hotel. He is helpful, efficient and professional. I believe everyone having breakfast would agree on what I said.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Value and Great Experience
desc: It was a delightful stay at the Orchard Rendezvous. Excellent service, a wonderful selection of restaurants, and easy to get anywhere in Singapore from their location. They have the friendliest and most helpful people at the front desk.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay at their Club room!
desc: The hotel staff have been incredibly hospitable and kind, going out of their way in ensuring a comfy stay. Special mention to Sofia and Dixon who took the initiative to making my time here more comfortable. The rooms and facilities are great too, but the friendly staff & good service is what differentiates them from the rest.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good family hotel, closed to amenities
desc: Good hotel, great staffs & very helpful. The location is closed to shopping centres, restaurants & convenient store. Felt safe to walk around with young children nearby the hotel. Breakfast is a la cart√™ with a plate of fruits every morning.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice stay
desc: Been at Orchard Rendezvous within a Business trip. Very good location and very friendly staff. Suggestion is to access the Club Lounge of the hotel for a more upscaled and classy experience: the atmosphere of the lounge is quiet and relaxing, ideal for business calls. The staff in charge there, Samy and Sofia, makes the place even brighter.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Room size is a big plus
desc: Room is way bigger than regular SG hotels. Accomodated my early check-in. 24hrs reception assistance. Bed is amazing. Location is also a plus, in between two mrt stations. Lots of restauarants next two the hotel. Easy transport.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesomeness!
desc: Front desk staffs awesome service, kudos to Mr Andrew, Mr Sufian and Mr Thava! Club 17 - genuinely sincere, they are truly passionate with their roles, thank you for the tiramisu and the Ipoh keropo! Kudos to Ms Sofia, Mr Ash and Mr Samy!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Hotel Service with a Smile Always! Definitely worth coming...
desc: Impromptu staycation here was one of my best experiences! Staffs Club Level 17: Sofia , Ash and Samy & Front Desk : Thavan/ Andrew and Sufian. They were the best people that met my day here sunshine üåû. I must comment that people skills are one of the best priceless that one will feel fro the heart when people have given forward . I was late in my check in , forgot my charger. Andrew loan me his personal phone charger without 2nd thought cos is late at night when I checked in. Thavan tried his best and gave given me a late check out so I got more time without rushing ...I was so grateful...and Sufian took me and my friend to my level to navigate...thank you guys! U truly made my night so bright. To the club level 17, u guys never fail to cheer us with your smiles and

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great value for money
desc: Very good rate for the orchard road area though 5 minutes walk from ion etc. service excellent. Rooms clean and appear to have been renovated recently. My only grip is that there is absolutely no seating in the lobby area.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation at Rendezvous
desc: Impeccable service. Room was comfortable and staff were attentive. One of the best services I have encountered. Breakfast variety could have been better though. Not a bad staycation option in the heart of Orchard.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean and tidy.
desc: Helpful staff, room clean and tidy. A bit of a trek to our room which was facing the car-park but as we were onlythere for two days this wasn't too much of a problem. Swimming pool was a nice area. However the showere there had run out of shower gel so it was hard to freshen up from our flight (room not ready). Hotel very central with plenty of restaurants to choose from and five minute walk to Metro.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Family Room
desc: The family room is so big I have never seen before for such price I paid for. Staff service in reception and restaurant is also excellent. Food quality for the breakfast is satisfactory as well. Last but not least, hotel location is another selling point such that it is very convenient to go to anywhere in SG by public transport. To conclude, I highly recommend this hotel to my friends.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Located in the heart of Singapore's bustling Orchard Road
desc: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel Singapore is a fantastic choice for anyone looking for a luxurious and comfortable stay in Singapore. With its exceptional service, stunning amenities, and prime location, it's no wonder that guests continue to rave about this hotel.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Hotel
desc: A fabulous hotel in a great location only minutes walk to Orchard MRT. Well presented very clean hotel. Check in was easy and the staff were fantastic. A big Thank You to Ashraf who organised a fabulous room for us. He went to the trouble to give us a grand welcome for our anniversary and also organised our transfers. Jacqueline was really helpful in offering interesting suggestions and directions, really friendly and helpful. Sofia was fantastic and always greeted us with a genuine smile and made us feel welcome. Sammy, Jea, Dixon, Julius and Thawa could not be more helpful. I think all of the staff deserve and 11 out of 10 for their hospitality. The housekeeping staff did a wonderful job keeping the hotel spotless. Overall a great stay and we will return on our next visit

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable, nice location
desc: Nice location, very nice staff. Make sure you get a room on the quiet side of the hotel. We‚Äôve got a room on the side where a club was located. Loud beats every night till 3-4 o clock in the morning! The hotel itself was perfect, but I would only stay here again if I was guaranteed a quiet room on the other side of the hotel.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: 2 Night Stay
desc: Staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful. Dixon surprised me with a birthday cake - very thoughtful. Location was excellent. Would stay at Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality again. Rooms were dated but clean and comfortable.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel Accomodation
desc: Location was alright but perhaps at the wrong end of Orchard Rd. Club room very disapointing with the food that was offered. Staff were very friendly and obliging. The rooms were very comfortable and clean.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Family time
desc: They offer Good food Very friendly, helpful, and approachable staff Clean and comfortable rooms. Nice location, near convenience stores and malls. We had a fun and Hassle free stay. Highly recommended

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing Rendezvous
desc: We recently stayed in a club room at Orchard Rendezvous in room 1616. The room was spacious, and well appointed with beautiful amenities. I mentioned to staff that I had a issue with large soft pillows, the next morning there was a message on our bed from housekeeping with 2 new memory foam pillows which was amazing! We met some outstanding staff, in the Club room, Ash,Samy,Jea,Julius,Dixon, who everyday engaged with us, enquiring about our day and offering lots of information of what we could do in Singapore. At the front ,Jacqueline always greeted us with a smile and helped us navigating how to get around. Maybe the breakfast in the Club room could have a bit more variety but overall we really enjoyed our stay and the staff certainly added to our experience e

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hospitality
desc: We experienced great hospitality. The staff was extremely helpful. The team around Ash deserves a special mention. The staff on the 17th floor is incredibly friendly and personally approached, all our wishes were read from our eyes.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Best value hotel along Orchard!
desc: Absolutely fantastic hotel located just a 10 minutes walk from Orchard MRT. Couldn‚Äôt have any complaints. Service was top quality from the minute I stepped in till check-out. They exceeded my expectations with some requests I had in my booking and arranged some lovely decor in our room as we were celebrating an occasion, many thanks to Jea and the rest of the team for that! Club lounge is great, quaint and relaxed with decent F&B.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay in a club room
desc: Great experience. Very pleasant staff. Nice room facing the swimming pool. Good service ... Special thanks to the staff of the Club Lounge: Sofia Samy Dixon Ash and Jeq who were very considerate. For sure I will be back soon.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Experience with Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
desc: It was a great stay in Orchard Rendezvous Hotel. Spacious and Comfortable Room. Prime location to our meeting venue. Areas for Food Improvement , especially breakfast at 17th floor (very limited food selection).

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Very happy to stay again
desc: great hotel, really helpful staff (especially the club lounge wait staff) Would be very happy to stay there again. Located close to the Orchard Rd shopping area and the MRT makes getting anywhere really easy.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Average
desc: couple of bad things in the room, condition was pretty old and a little under what was expected but the staff that served me was amazing during check in and also followed up during check out, it was a good first touchpoint

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Unexpected Excellency
desc: Excellent hotel Very clean Respectful and approachable employees Spectacular food Very highly recommended I would like to stay again in one of the suits of this hotel, it was a very memorable experience to meet different nationalities.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice work experience
desc: The hotel staff went out of its way to ensure my computer, lap top, and phone were connected, regardless of where I worked. They also changed my room at the first request. My dry cleaning was done within 2 days and the hotel staff ensured that it arrived in my new room. I look forward to coming back to this hotel for pleasure!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: I have stayed at the hotel for many years, and it just keeps getting better. The service is very friendly and helpful. The rooms are set up nicely and most are surprisingly good-sized. The baby-back rims are a most order from room service.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: service in the restaurant is not up to the mark
desc: Food for vegetarians are not available and the fruits served are very limited . Fruits served are very minimum and there is no further supply even after request at all. Menu for the breakfast is fixed .

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Helpful doorman
desc: Very helpful service from the doorman Arun! The hotel itself is a bit old and the bathroom a bit dated but otherwise an enjoyable stay. Didn‚Äôt use the pool or gym so do t know what they look like. Good location

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Worn conference hotel
desc: Good hotel if you are many since a big hotel. My room was very worn, felt old and at the end of a maze of corridors. Thin walls and noisy neighbours. Pool area is nice but when I was there the bar was not open. This felt more like a 3 star hotel than 4.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Solo trip but chill
desc: The check in was smooth, Jae escort me to the room and she was very nice soft spoken lady. The room was okay, just the AC a lil bit noisy it‚Äôs kind of disturbing to a light sleeper. Sofia was friendly, she makes people feel comfortable to talk with. Overall is good.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay at Orchard Rendezvous, Singapore
desc: Went here for the 4th times on my solo business trip - It really feels like home with super friendly and hospitable staffs : special shout out here to Thava & Sofia Frankin :) who know me by name ! Thank you for the room upgrade to the Suite room - spectacular amazing city and swimming pool view with a club benefits, super love the private breakfast buffet lounge at the 17th Floor. It has always been a very pleasant experience during my stay at Orchard Rendezvous, Singapore. Warm Regards, Devina Mardiputri - e27.co

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Accomodating
desc: Staff was very good and welcoming. Hotel is nice and clean. Credits to Sofia for handling my booking and requests! Location of hotel is perfect. If I may suggest, hotel toilets be equipped with bidet ‚úåüèº

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable stay
desc: We're so pleased with the service of Ms. Morisette, thank you so much for your upmost attention, hospitality and extra effort to make our stay memorable :) The hotel is in great location, 10 minute walking distance to ION with great value for money compare to similar stars hotel in those area. Clean room and swimming pool.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Feedback
desc: Very good and helpful staff. Comfortable and clean rooms. Club lounge was very handy where one could drop in any time for a informal meet with the group and good supply of snacks and drinks throughout the day.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Stay
desc: It was a good stay over there, a nice pool, but it was very hot and humid during our stay, so that we did not wat we want to do in Singapore, but that has nothing to do with the quality of the hotel so far

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Honest Review
desc: Terrific location but the building is quite old and has some gremlins within it. Needed to change rooms over a 4 night stay due to some of these gremlins. Beds were not the most comfortable either. Pool area is the highlight.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A great trip ever
desc: My daughter and I recently enjoyed a wonderful vacation at this hotel, thanks to its convenient location and friendly staff. The hotel is situated just a few minutes' walk from Ion mall at Orchard turn, and the Forum mall is also just a short 2-minute walk away. The staff members were consistently helpful and attentive, always ready to assist us whenever we needed anything. Overall, if you're looking for a comfortable and cozy hotel that's conveniently located near great shopping options, this is definitely an excellent choice.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay, great experience.
desc: Awesome place, great and friendly staff. Wasn't expecting great hospitality but they delivered. The stay was comfortable for a business trip, had all the things I needed. Would definitely come back again.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Feel like a VIP
desc: The team on the club lounge floor took excellent care of me while I was there, special praise should go to Ash, Sofia, Samy, Dixon and Jea for making my time so relaxing and memorable. The team really made me feel special and very welcome. During those days I felt like a VIP and I loved it. Thank you. I would happily stay here again.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation 2023
desc: The staycation was good..staff were great ..location was good too..my kid had fun swimminng in the pool..but only if there is more privacy on the pool side will be better..i found that the llft to the pool can be access by any visitor..

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Orchard Rendezvous stay
desc: The rooms are really lovely as is the pool and a lovely oasis to the bustling Orchard road. Outside bathrooms by pool a great benefit. Very helpful front desk and staff. Hotel is located at the top of Orchard road and is a 10 minute walk to the MRT.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Dont Bother
desc: The reception is so budget hotel even without seating area. no welcome drink. the bellboy is not there upon arrival you have to ask concierge to help you out with the luggages. the room quality is not worth the money. slime at the corner of the tub, bins not washed, bed move and separate.. the pool tiles come onee one by one while the kids were swimming so dangerous and sharp!!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent location and great Hotel Service.
desc: We booked the double bed with club access. The staffs at the club lounge were friendly and provided excellent service. Would like to thank Mr Samy, Mr Ash, Ms Sofia and Mr Dixon for their remarkable service. Good job!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic stay
desc: I was recommended this hotel by a friend who stayed here before. It was nice coming back to Singapore after Covid-19 restrictions. This hotel location is great, easy to get around and go for shopping. Counter staff are excellent and very helpful upon our arrival. They also helped us booked taxi around whenever we need one. Room was big enough and come with a balcony and pool view. Although the hotel doesn‚Äôt look new but it is clean and comfortable. We will come back later this year again and will stay here for sure.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel
desc: Spacious family suite for 4 adults. House keeping we good daily. Breakfast was not bad but limited in terms of options, would be better if it was buffet style. Swimming pool at rooftop and 24/7 gym to work out and tone body. Located at one end of Orchard Toad, can stroll along zor hard Road to get to all the shops and malls, and within 3 m-4mins walk to MRT station that brings you to all corners of Singapore.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay , close to everything
desc: Absolutely fantastic place to stay in Singapore, close by to MRT and Shopping , Hotel itself is very clean and has all the comforts you need , I booked my accommodation into the club room and it would be one of the best club rooms I have been in , food and drinks were excellent and the Staff were incredible catering to whatever I needed or asked for , Ash, Samy ,Jea , Dixon and Sofia were all amazing and I can only thank them all for making my stay one of the best experiences i have had on a business trip ,

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Best staycation yet again
desc: A returned guest with family for another birthday celebration. As always the staffs at Orchard Rendezvous never fail to amazed us. Super friendly and super accomodating to all our requests. Again, Mr Sufian was around to serve us and assured us a good stay ahead. Thank you to all the team in Orchard Rendezvous Hotel!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortabke Experience with good location
desc: Location: Short distance to metro in buzzing shopping district of Orchard with high-end shops if you are into it. Rooms: Very clean and nicely furnished, bed was comfortable Staff: Friendly and fast(cheers to Nancy from reception)

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: One week in Singapore

Thanks to Dixon, Sofia, Sany, Jea and Ash that made every day a great one! I would definitely recommend it to anyone visiting Singapore.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel, great location, brilliant staff
desc: We stayed five nights here. From our arrival to check out all the staff were welcoming, professional and helpful. From reception staff, porters and housekeepers. We signed up for daily breakfasts that was worth every penny. The staff at the lounge were so welcoming, attentive and helpful with information about things to see and experience in Singapore. Also with public transport information. We would especially like to thank Sammy, Sofia, Ash, Jea, Dixon and Julius. It was a pleasure to meet you all.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Stay in the Hotel.
desc: I would like to add that my friend and I were very satisfied with the service provided by your staff, especially by both Mr Samy and Ash. They were so attentive and friendly and ensured that our needs are being managed promptly. I would definitely revisit the hotel and recommend it to my friends and family. It was an excellent 3 days 2 nights!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Memorable Stay
desc: Had a great staycation during the long weekend which we were celebrating my son birthday. Concierge was helpful with assistant to our luggage the moment we step out of the vehicle. Was greeted and check in by Mr Suffian smoothly.. We were suppose to check out at 12 but was given late check out due to the heavy downpour.. Thank you once again with this memorable experience and will definately return for our next staycation..

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Marvellous Orchard Rendezvous hotel in Singapore
desc: It was an amazing stay, the best part is morning breakfast in Meditternean Restaurant. Its a fixed menu and no more wastage of food, you choose your menu and go for it. It is served on your table. This exciting theme is an excellent in wasting food and saving environment and economy too. If it is buffet, then there is tempting in eating, which we fill up plate but land up in throwing more food. Due to temptation we take it but don't eat it. This hotel Orchard Rendezvous is an excellent hotel for staying and or for sustainable environment point of view. Also there are no plastic bottles in room, a glass water bottle is kept and water can be taken from any tap and which is consumable without any problems. In that way no more plastic. Its a marvellous theme and am very proud of

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore's delight
desc: Our stay was very comfortable. The staff were friendly and accommodating. Our Service Manager Thava took great care in assisting us. We enjoyed the proximity to Orchard Street and the additional help provided with transport.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Club Level at Orchard Rendezvous takes Warm Service to Another Level!
desc: My stay at the O.R. Hotel was a most memorable experience. The Club Level (17th Floor) was such fantastic start to each day of my stay. Admittedly when I first arrived I was not feeling my best. The Club Level host Samy immediately recognised this and was extremely sensitive. As I got better day by day he and Sofia greeted me every morning with a warm and welcome smile and first class service as I returned to my normal self. I am so grateful to them and their superior team including Ash, Jea, Dixon and Julius. This group and fine hotel surely know what it means to give excellent, warm and welcoming friendliness to the guests at this fine establishment in beautiful Singapore.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Rip off experience
desc: Go to another place, where they can support a client after an Intercontinenatl flight ... and not just looking to grab as much money as possible proposing you to upgrade the room to the same room you had before, to allow an early check in, for a consistent amount of money ... and do not tell you anything about what is included in the new package (Lounge ?)

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful experience
desc: The hotel is well placed on local bus routes. We got around easily. Lots to see and do within walking distance. The staff were very helpful and attentive. The breakfast was great, plenty to choose from. The pool was amazing!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful hotel and service
desc: Had a wonderful stay. The club lounge is wonderful (great service from Samy and Ash). The pool and restaurants onsite are great and very convenient. bus stop is across the street and shopping is very close.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Orchard Rendezvous return visit
desc: I've stayed at this hotel on several occasions now, I have stayed in many similar priced hotels, mainly larger chain hotels and prefer the Orchard Rendezvous as it feels a little more personal and friendly. The rooms are of a good size with a nice light d√©cor. The location is great and very convenient to all the shops and restaurants on Orchard.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Business Trip
desc: It was a 4 days and 3 nights stay, The room is spacious and clean, the club lounge is comfortable It is located in the central area, 5 min walk to ion orchard. The surrounding has a seven eleven next to it and starbucks just across the road.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Thank you very much
desc: I was able to stay comfortably during my stay.Would definitely stay here again.I was too busy to use breakfast this,but I would like to use it next time. I woule liketo use The Pool next time. Thank you very much.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Recommended üëç
desc: The room was clean and had all the things we needed . The hotel location is good , it's on orchard main road so it's very convenient to walk to nearby shopping area. Breakfast was also nice. Especially the all the staffs were very friendly & helpful.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommend
desc: Had 2 stays at the hotel during June/July - first with business and second as a solo traveller. Both stays in the club rooms. Highly recommend. Rooms clean, quiet, comfortable with good aircon. Nice open air swimming pool & good choice of restaurants on site. Facilities of club lounge great. The team taking care of club guests were exemplary - made us so welcome & went out their way to be helpful and kind. The staff I met were Ash, Sofia, Samy, Dixon, Jea & Julias - all lovely, professional and friendly. Reception staff also great - especially Lori. Thank you all!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel close to downtown
desc: Nice hotel, a littel old furniture but good service especially in the Club Lounge many thanks to Samy very kind, cleanness is good, location is good to visit downtown Singapore, Over all nice hotel worth it's price compared with others. ....

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable Stay
desc: Located in a very busy 3-way intersection and at least a 10-minute walk to the Orchard MRT station, this hotel did have its plusses. Brewerkz restaurant is on its ground floor & served a good breakfast. There were other restaurants available in the area also. We were especially happy that there was a supermarket very nearby (in the basement below a Starbucks & Muddy Murphy's Irish pub) for us to get fresh food/fruits & basic necessities. Rooms were spacious & comfortable. Outdoor pool was very inviting with a sheltered patio.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Average experience
desc: Hotel has been renovated and is very nice inside. Room was spacious and we had a kitchen area but no crockery, glasses or utensils so was unusable. All cupboards were empty? Decor was very plain. It was also freezing, turned the aircon off but the fan kept running and I was cold at night. Very very long queues for breakfast. Breakfast is al a carte made to order. Twice mine was stone cold. Also the dining room is freezing cold. Didn't bother with breakfast on the third day. Tea in the pot was cold. No teabags to make your own, you would have to bring one from your room? Pool was pleasant but you had to walk past a grotty area to get to it. Pool bar looked decent but was not open once during our stay - very disappointing.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable Business Stay
desc: A wonderful business stay with all facilities provided! Good for families too! The hotel have self-laundry option and very attentive and helpful staff. Walking distance to a number of malls surrounding Orchard Road and great Club lounge atmosphere. All were great üëçüèº

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Had a great stay!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
