hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

desc: Our family of 4 stayed here for four months due to the Malaysian MCO/ circuit breaker measures. Classic hotel with a very convenient location, just at the corner of orchard road. hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly staffs and nice facilities
desc: Had a nice staycation at Orchard Rendezvous Hotel! Had a nice view out from our room! The staffs were also friendly and welcoming! Very thankful for Sofia who is cheerful and helpful when we had requests!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Bday Staycation
desc: I had a staycation with my friend at Orchard Rendezvous Hotel Singapore for my bday. It was a wonderful experience. The Front Office Sophia ( i am not sure of her name) who assisted me was very generous of giving me a room upgrade after finding out it is my birthday. The whole staff is amazing esp the Housekeeping. Thank you for your patience and superb attention to guest's needs. This place is at the heart of Orchard. I LOVE how accessible the location is to everything you need but again, nothing beats the Friendly & Professional staff . Thank you guys. Can't wait for my next visit.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean and comfortable
desc: The room was big, clean and comfortable, though may look a little old. A pity there wasn't a bath tub. Also the view on the other side of the hotel, has a lot of greenery, a different side of Orchard that I never expected.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Basic Hotel in Orchard
desc: This is the former Orchard Parade Hotel and I booked a Deluxe Room for a night's stay. Check-in was a breeze, it took about five minutes. The room was clean, well maintained and basic. There is a work desk and a side table with an arm chair, hence it is suitable for two persons to work together in the room. The bathroom has no bathtub, with only a shower stall with a choice of rain shower or showering with the shower head. There were no toiletries provided and I had to request for them. Another point to note is that there isn't any bottled water provided, they recommend drinking from the tap as it is safe to do so. Overall it's a basic decent hotel to stay in, no complaints.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant experience overall
desc: Clean rooms with no bottled water. Toiletries a bit lacking as other hotels do provide conditioner and body moisturiser. Reminder to look for the DND sign to hang on the door. Housekeeping will ring, knock and call around 9am

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: ‚ÄòHotel 81‚Äô version of hotel within the Orchard belt
desc: Expect only the minimal- amenities, tea coffee, probably was 2 ply toilet paper, no water- gotta ownself boil, and twice- no hot water. We had to shower in the cold and what an experience it was..Recept was nice but feels like due to COVID, not much manpower to run operations..

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good service recovery
desc: Great service recovery. Room was big too. They have smoking rooms etc too which lets customers have a very good idea on what they want. Family rooms allow them to have kids in the room too. Perfect for a family staycation

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Short Staycation
desc: If you're looking to do a short staycation, there are better places in Singapore to do so. In-room amenities are very limited, and hotel's interior seems dated. Hotel does not seem to be of 4star quality

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Happy short vacation!
desc: My hubby has booked 3 days 2 night for the deluxe room from 04/09/21 - 06/09/21 (3 days 2 night) once we were arrive there was no room available so the staff apologize and offer us by upgrade to the suit room(which is okay for us) We were having a great time during staycation here at The Orchard Rendezvous Hotel for the first time here too,as the staff here was helpful, friendly and have service mind especially Sofia , Raj and one more guy who was served us breakfast for 3 days as he had remember what we requested for the first days and it's really appreciate it!)üëç Thank you so much! We will visit again.üòä

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

We were assisted by Ms Jocelyn (I cant recall if i got her name correctly) & Mr Azali to get our room changed. After the first night, room aircon wasn‚Äôt working really well and we informed Ms Liya. The aircon was fixed by the engineer team (Mr Faz & Mr Fahmi) when we went out to run some errands. Problem was rectified and fixed swiftly. Not forgetting, the excellent breakfast service we had for the past 2 mornings by the team. We will definitely come back to this hotel again. Keep up the great work üëçüèº

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: Excellent service and warm welcoming hospitality. Will definately stay again. Leisure and essential area are well excessable. Carpark abit too squeezy but other than that everything was fine and ok...

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing Service! Enjoyable family staycation.
desc: We had a family staycation over the weekend and we truly enjoyed it! We were greeted warmly by the concierge team - Arun, Bob & Mohan from the moment we arrived at the hotel. They were helpful and very knowledgeable. They know everything about Orchard road and the surrounding area and were able to give us good advice on where to go for our meals, where to shop etc. Also, seeing that we have a young daughter with us they also asked if we needed to book a slot for the swimming pool and guided us to book a slot with reception. Very attentive of them. When we reached the reception, we were pleasantly surprised by the friendly & warm staff - Sophia & Ex. Unlike a lot of other receptionist we have encountered, these 2 were really very friendly and genuine. You can see it from their

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation Sep School Holiday
desc: The room was refurbished and the toilet was new and clean. Amenities sufficient, with thick toilet paper roll rim and tissue box. Great showerhead. Mini balcony with a view, I stayed at 12 floor. Twin bed was spacious for 4 of us ( 7 and 10 year old kids). Housekeeping lady saw us checking into the room and gave us 2 more towels and shower gel + shampoo. Great service.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Normal standard hotel with no surprise
desc: Not kids friendly hotel. The carpark has no direct access to the hotel and it need to go throught alot of stair and obtacles. Imagine pushing stroller and pulling heavy luggage from car park is a nightmare. Hotel pool do not have kids pool as well. Just a very traditional and standard hotel. However, the hotel is very close to Orchard road which is the shopping district and overall is very clean.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Poor Room Facilities
desc: I dont understand how a power outlet melting my DYSON hair dryer but was said that their power outlet has no issue. Even scalded my palm with no knowledge of the problem while removing the plug. I am very disappointed in their management. I did not even ask for any compensation. Felt that the investigation was so superficial. Good luck to your future guests. For those who do not know, simply google the site on melted power socket and you can see the reasons pretty straight forward and clear. Since the staff of the hotel was ignorant enough to do so even though they can agree to see melted parts of the part insist their ENGINEERS SAID THERE WERE NO ISSUE.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the Best Staycations !
desc: As soon as we enter the hotel lobby, we were greeted and ushered by the doorman with a big smile to the front counter. Then we were served by Ms Sofia and Mr Raj who are really experienced and super friendly which made the the whole check-in process smooth and pleasant. It seem as though they were prepared and expecting for my arrival. We had even our room upgraded, swimming pool usage slots and in-room breakfast all advised to us and well settled. It was definitely a wonderful experience! Will be back again for another staycation.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Family Staycation
desc: I've booked 2 rooms for 3 nights during the school holidays. From the moment of arrival we were greeted by Samsudin and he assisted with the luggages. Mel & Patrick were smooth upon check in and gave us a room on the 17th floor. The Concierge Yingzhi was friendly & club floor team, Sofia & team (didn't really get their names.. the 3 gentlemen & the lady wearing with glasses) they were all great & friendly. Breakfast was good, nice & simple. We enjoyed the pool as well and booking was easy. Upon check out, Mario was very helpful, approached us to assist the luggages. The whole family enjoyed our stay and we hope to return soon for future staycations!!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: awesome room and staff !
desc: }orchard rendezvous hotel } thanks to the staff name john , he assisted me with my early check-in request ;) and was given a complimentary upgrade to superior rm for 1 nite as im celebrating my bf bday (psst its my 1st time here at this hotel) ! love the room thou with a mini bathtub and the pool at 6th floor was awesome despite the raining unforseen weather ! thanks john ! me n bf enjoy our short staycay ! excellent location as its just within distances to forum n or orchard road too ! thumbs up! cheers! Suzy;)

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Unforgettable experience (above our expectations)
desc: Front desk staffs were helpful, polite and attentive. They assisted with all our needs as my parents are both visually impaired. Thanks to Ms Sofia and team for making our stay a memorable one! We will definitely recommend our family and friends to this hotel!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: More than adequate for a staycation, SHN or visit!
desc: The room was very clean and definitely met the Covid guidelines. I have chosen this hotel for my SHN, and am very glad I made the right choice. A bottle of dishwashing liquid and CIF were provided - which came in so handy during the quarantine. I'm missing the team very much - a huge shout-out to Nammi and John, who have gone over and beyond, to make my stay more than comfortable! I want to thank them here. I had a room with balcony, facing the swimming pool. From the 14th floor, the pool and surrounding area looked immaculate and it would be a great hotel for staycation as well as visitors overseas, as you're bang right on the road leading to the beginning of Orchard Road. Ordering food in was a breeze - a wide variety to choose from and hotel staff was very quick to bring

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: BEST STAY EVER!
desc: I spent my 7-day SHN, followed by additional 12 days in this hotel. I absolutely loved my stay as the room was spacious and came with a balcony. Most importantly, I was very well taken care of by the staff members there. They even accommodated my request of having breakfast delivered to my room at 6:30am. A big shoutout to Mario and Sofia for their kind hospitality. Last but not least, a big thanks to Pushpa for amazing room cleaning service. Overall, it was an amazing stay and I have already missed seeing them everyday.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Relaxing Staycation
desc: Stayed here for the weekend. I would recommend this if you are looking for a chill place to relax. Its close enough to everything you need, without the crowds :) One of the more memorable staff, Liya, helped us throughout the stay! She was there to help us for both check in and check outs. üòä

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay!
desc: We took a one-day getaway to celebrate our anniversary and was granted a room upgrade to the family room! Appreciate the staff‚Äôs superb service; the service staff was friendly and gifted us chocolate truffles in celebration of our anniversary!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The family room was huge
desc: The family room with bunk bed was huge. My kids love the bunk bed of course. Location was good. Walking distance to the major shopping malls and mrt. Only complaint I have was the room service. It‚Äôs difficult to get anyone to answer the line. Had to call multiple times before someone answered the phone. Pool was good size. Lovely stay except for the room service hiccup.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Delightful staycation!
desc: We had an enjoyable time at Orchard Rendezvous! The reception staff were always attentive, sincere, and pleasant. Our room was clean, spacious, and well-equipped. The hotel had laid back vibes and was a nice escape from the busy town area. The location was very accessible to food and shopping. The pool and gym were well-maintained and bookings were well-organised. Thank you for the warm hospitality and sweet memories!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wedding anniversary Staycation
desc: From the time we arrived, we were very impressed with the warm and welcoming service given by the hotel. Especially Mr Arun (doorman) who was very helpful and observant. 5‚≠êÔ∏è. Every minute details were taken care of. 6‚≠êÔ∏è üëçand thank you for this awesome experience!!!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Short and Enjoyable Staycation
desc: Very warm and friendly staff who are willing to assist you with a smile. Special thanks to Sufia, Mario and Arun :-) Great facilities and services. Rooms are very clean. Location is very good. Walking distance to shopping malls and attractions. Ample parking lots at the multi-storey carpark.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Boring place for SHN
desc: Overall satisfied with the stay. It would have been better if there was Netflix. Unable to link TV to phone. Just normal channels. It bored me to death. Imagine staying inside the room for 7 days without any Netflix or sports channel. Boleh mati ooh...

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great and comfortable stay
desc: Did a 3D2N staycation and was a great experience. We had the family room for our group of 4 and it was very comfortable. There were sufficient food options in the vicinity and a Brewerkz close by. Main orchard road central is only a 10 min walk away

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great customer service
desc: Was impressed with the customer service level of the hotel as even the porters and bell hops chipped in to ease the long queue and reduce waiting times assisting to request for forms to be filled etc. Though hotel rooms were abit dated, this was more than made up for by the overall excellent standards of the customer service, keep it up

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Old tired n terrible service - is there any service at all?
desc: No one cares, no one listen, security issues, social distancing issues. Wont ever stay there again as i think the chances of me catching covid there is high given their slack attitude to measures n to pp feedback

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: clean n big room
desc: staffs are friendly, room are big n clean. awesome stay for staycation. shopping all nearby. wifi a bit slow in the room, so far so good. no hair dryer in room. i cannot find in my room. breakfast are served can add in request if want more or others foodies. friendly staffs

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome Hotel
desc: Room is clean and spacious, value for money. The staffs are super friendly and humorous. Would definitely recommend it to our family and friends. Would suggest an upgrade to the television, maybe a larger one?

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: N
desc: They have have the Best SOP among all the hotels we visited so far .They have the fastest check In . I am already used to waiting for 2-3 hours for my room to be ready so when I was just testing my luck to register earlier , Diana was very approachable and accommodating . She did the registering in less than 15 mins although she had to process my upgrade to a bigger room. And to my sweet surprise, the room is ready right after registering. It was not even 2 pm! Even the procedure on the pool booking system is excellent and the elderly Gentleman manning it is very friendly . Because of his maturity , he is very polite and tactful when telling the guests about the pool‚Äôs policy and when their time is up in his. Some hotels just put part time students and they can barely manage

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Relaxing stay with slight hiccups
desc: The overall stay is good. We were very pleased to be upgraded from Twin Room to a Family room. However there were slight hiccups with the room TV (don't know how to operate or faulty but was corrected), Room WIFI (not working and was told that it was linked to the TV) & faulty bedside power plug. Nevertheless, still a good stay.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Dated hotel
desc: Stayed in 1008, aircon leaked the whole night in the second night, causing sleep disruption. Room 1016 no shower door‚Ä¶ the cleanliness is ok but the room is definitely dated. Choose this place if you have a tight budget but still want a base to go shopping in town‚Ä¶ otherwise for the hotel experience is not worth it‚Ä¶

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation at a Quiet Corner of Orchard Road
desc: Though the location may be slightly further away from the amenities and popular shopping centres, I love it as I do not like crowds. Service was great and room was spacious. It would be perfect if they provide bathrobe for guests prior access to swimming pool, which requires guests to obtain swim pass from the counter at the lobby.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful 6th Anniversary Staycation
desc: Me & Wifey was there to spend our 6th anniversary. As we entered, we were greeted by a very jovial and friendly man! His name was Bob, then along came Mario who were very much friendly too! I was super delighted by these 2 gentlemen. As i was waiting in the queue, Mr Arun came by and assisted us by having my wife to be seated in the waiting area while waiting to be check in. I was like wow! These services style must be from a pure natural veterans in hotel line. Upon check-in, I was handled by Ms Sophia from Front Desk..I was totally awe on how friendly she is! I get upgraded to Suite room and gotten cocktail dinner 2 days in a row. During breakfast, we were served by Ms Theresa and Mr Samy..they were stars that perks up our morning with their services! Ms Sophia, Ms

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Year End Staycation at Orchard
desc: Check-in and check-out process was quick and fast. Hotel attendants are very warm and hospitable. We were very pleased and surprised at how clean and comfortable the room we were assigned to. They were kind to upgrade us to the highest floor on the club wing since we purchased with breakfast. It is our first time staying in the Orchard area, everything was accessible and convenient to go to. We are looking forward to going back to Orchard Rendezvous Hotel again!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Enjoyable Stay!
desc: A big thank you to Liya for the 5 star service! It was a very comfortable stay. And thank you to Arun, Mario, Bob and John for assisting as well! The room is big enough to accommodate our family of 4. We will definitely return!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent customer service
desc: Heck in staff esp Ms sookee was polite and helpful. Porters and bell hops helped to pitch in during the busy afternoon checkins by directing the queues and helped show the way to the rooms. Glad to recommend this hotel to friends and relatives

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: NO USB POINT
desc: No usb socket to charge phone. Must explain and request from front desk. A plug to charge phone. As we have own usb cable to charge our phones. Only 1 usb plug was given. To charge 4 phones in total. disappointed.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation at Orchard Rendezvous
desc: My wife and I booked this hotel for our birthdays celebration using our SG Rediscovery Vouchers. We were pleasantly surprised with a room upgrade from Deluxe to a huge Family Room with a pleasant view of the Orchard Rd. Although the hotel looks dated, we noted some refurbishments done to modernized it. The carpets looks new. The aircon and toilets all functioning. Room is clean and comfortable. Breakfast with mixture of muffins with burger and fish nuggets, salad, fruit platter, croissants, juice and coffee/tea is good value and nice at only $20/pax. They have a nice simple gym with all the basic equipment which is sufficient for a simple workout. Overall, the hotel is clean and comfortable. The hotel staff are enthusiastic and provided excellent service especially Sofia, Liya

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: Very nice and pleasant stay with smooth check in.. Nice swimming pool and within walking distance to eateries and amenities. Will strongly recommend to all my friends who like to have a staycation in Singapore

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Orchard rendezvous hotel reviews
desc: 3days, 2nights staycay was really awesome. All of the staffs were very nice. Such a great customer service. The rooms are clean and spacious. Went for swimming and really enjoyed it. Love it!! Well recommendedüëçüèº

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Short Staycation away from the hustle & bustle. A great getaway.
desc: Liya (hotel receptionist) upgraded our room due to a special occasion during check-in. It was unexpected and a great surprise. Kudos to Ms. Liya for her kind gesture and thoughts. Would be a great asset to the company for such a pro-active staff.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Staycay
desc: Very friendly staffs and the check in was very smooth. All details and info explained clearly. The room is nice and spacious. Didn‚Äôt have chance to try the pool and gym as they close at 6pm. Overall, still great and a good staycation. Highly recommended

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome team
desc: Is really wonderful during our stay start from the smooth check in by front desk staff Liya a really professional explain and check in process ,our room is decent and the clean ,we have some request amenities the housekeeping De Liang is very effective to send to us ,at the club lounge during cocktail time was awesome if stay there that the place u couldn't missed ,that again see our favourite staff Liya and her team member Clare serve the food and drinks to us with a warm and friendly ,then next day we have the breakfast serve at club lounge that a lady name Sofia make us the staycation trip complete with the amazing service and care during our breakfast, is a wonderful stay will back again for the high standard hospitality, awesome team

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation with family
desc: Very clean hotel. Swimming pool was also well kept and clean. Will definitely come again! Near to orchard which is easy accessible to food. Check in and check out was a breeze... staffs were all friendly!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome and Great
desc: Dispite the current COVID, i have booked 3 rooms for my family as partly to celebrate my niece sweet 16th. the Bday package I had booked was so lovely. Clare (the intern if I can recall) she was great with the deco and dispite the off office hours, she manage to sent the cake and wine as we wanted it a surprise for my niece. The only thing is if the team can be a little more attentive where (cake knife and candle be provided). And Joyce who has arrange all my 3 rooms at the same level. last but not least to mention Sofra and other Guest Service (cannot recall her name) they are so professional with my check In as the rooms were not ready by the time we checked in. Stay safe guys. Will return soon.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Overall is a great service and stay with ORH
desc: Overall is a great service and stay with ORH. The room and bathroom was great although a bit different from the ad we saw. The front service was helpful and accommodating. Swimming pool was great sadly its a raining season.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Bachelorette celebration staycay
desc: I brought my friend here for a surprise bachelorette celebration staycay. I have to say it was one of the best customer service I have encountered. All the staff were very polite and greeted us with a smile. Special mention to Sofia for her incredible service and for going above and beyond. She upgraded our room to the Club floor and gave my friend a card and cake as requested. The room was nice and clean. We had a very pleasant stay and we will definitely visit again!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely stay at a decently quiet hotel in a great location
desc: Very quiet hotel - the room was spacious. The pool wasn‚Äôt overly crowded like other hotels, despite the hotel being at almost full vacancy. Check in was really fast. She was very friendly and warm when I checked in and enquired about the club lounge. They even opened it just for me to have a look. She served us breakfast as

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

desc: Stayed 1 night at the Family Suite. It had a king bed & bunk beds. The room was very clean and spacious with a sofa & dining table set for 4. The furniture was new & mattresses firm. There was a separate changing room & toilet had a clean bathtub. We got the Cath Kidston package so the room was tastefully done up with Cath Kidston items. Breakfast was served to the room and it was substantial. My 3 kids and I totally enjoyed our short staycation.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: 4th visit but same great experience and hospitality!
desc: This is my 4th visit to this hotel but nothing as changed in terms of experience and hospitality. The staff continued to serve with their hearts and provided GEMS service! A special shout-out to Ms Pushpa who went out of her way to make this staycation a memorable one that included making special arrangements for both our hotel stay and festive bus to watch the Xmas lights! I also want to extend my heartfelt gratitude to Mr Pannir from the swimming pool whom did his job sincerely and responsibly by ensuring everyone wore their masks, maintained social distancing and left on time to allow the next guests to patronize the swimming pool! Lastly, the bus operator for the Xmas lights was really very organized and punctual despite the usual Xmas Eve jams. I would definitely visit a

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely staff, Amazing Staycation Experience!
desc: This is my first staycation experience with my partner for our 5th year anniversary. We managed to get room upgrades and 1-hour access to both pools and gym during our stay. We would like to thank Liya and Raj for their warm hospitability and for making our anniversary celebration a special one!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Complimenting the staffs.
desc: It was indeed a great 3 days 2 night stay. Of course there are many more staff to give praises too, didnt get all their names right!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Experience, Impressive Customer Service by Front Desk staffs Liya & Raj
desc: My girlfriend and I had a wonderful 2D1N staycation experience at Orchard Rendezvous Hotel on 23 - 24 Dec 2021. The Hotel Front Desk staffs Liya and Raj were very friendly and helpful, ensuring that the start of our staycation was pleasant and comfortable. Their service were top-class and they assisted us in booking adjacent gym and swimming pool slots to make it convenient for us. Amazingly very fluent in more than 2 languages, they helped us feel at home as they proceeded with the check-in process, making a seemingly dull process engaging and pleasant. Overall, our room was awesome, our room was on the 16th floor and faced the swimming pool.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service!
desc: Served by Diana at the reception desk and she was awesome! Friendly, professional and knows our needs well! She asisted us to book the swimming pool slots and even offered to send the breakfast to our room FOC! I will definitely be back here again!

In short my family and i were treated like family instead of just guests. A smile was always etched on their faces and friendly greetings exchanged whenever we passed by each other at the hotel lobby. I approaced the front counter where the 3 staffs were on duty. I enquired about the possibility of a late checkout and upon seeing our

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: I enjoyed my stay at Orchard Rendezvous, and the staff (Raj/Sofia/Samy) were really pleasant, friendly and accommodating. The room was clean and cozy. I would recommend staying here, and I‚Äôll definitely visit again.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome stay!
desc: I came in for a stay on the 3rd of Dec and was pleasantly surprised by the professionalism of the staff and cleanliness of the rooms. Service was superb. I had to wait a little but it wasn't too long. I had a cocktail service included in my booking, and I must commend on the friendliness and attentiveness of the lounge staff. They looked after us well, always ensuring that our glasses were never empty and occasionally chatting with my parents. Overall, an outstanding place and I would love to visit again.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay, spacious room, great service
desc: Everything was great in the hotel. My boy and I enjoyed the hospitality when we check in. The staffs were very friendly. The swimming pool is great for my boy and I. Despite the distance being further from the central of town, it was still a great walk to Orchard. The only downside is that communication of swimming pool's usage could have been done better and more staffs can be allocated to the reception to cater to the crowd better.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Outstanding and warm service
desc: I stayed 2 weeks ago with my family. From the moment I walked in till my departure nothing to fault. The bellman Arun was always ready to help with a friendly smile. At front desk we met a very friendly and professional lady Sofia. As it was a busy period and the swimming pool slot was booked up she gave us a bigger room with bathtub for my kids as not to disappoint my kids enthusiasm. Which we are still grateful. Our room was cozy and very clean. I will definitely come back with my family. Stay safe and best wishes Orchard Rendezvous!!!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Close to amenities, reasonably priced for the area but don't expect too much
desc: Location is very good if you are keen on shopping, but little things in the room let it down, though thankfully it can be rectified easily. Thicker blankets, bigger towels, some common sense in bathroom amenities like having a place to place soap and shampoo in the shower, would really help to elevate the experience.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay at Orchard Rendezvous Hotel
desc: Staff are very pleasant and services are prompt. The room is excellent, comes with an opened air balcony. Rarely are there affordable hotels with balconies. Right in the middle of Orchard Road. Very convenient.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location & friendly service
desc: We had a 2 nights staycation in Dec. Check in was fast and staff were polite. Room is neat and clean, only the pillow is too flat for us. Very good location to shop around in Orchard. Wifi works fine too. Overall we enjoyed our stay with Orchard Rendezvous Hotel, thanks.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Birthday Staycation
desc: I had a wonderful birthday staycation here, Thank you Ms. Sofia & Mr, Samy for being so thoughtful to sent me a birthday cake and the bathrobe to my room. I got a room without bathtub but that's fine with me. I love the swimming pool, it was clean and less crowded. I'm looking forward to be here soon.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Room & Toilet
desc: The room.need to input qiblat direction for all muslim that stay in your hotel. Need to install toilet spray gun in the toilet. Overall the service is very good. Kept it up. Good...good ...good.........

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Air-conditioning issues
desc: Hotel is old, the room given to me has some air conditioning issues. Escalated to front desk which then escalated to technician but technician claims that its working fine. Could barely feel any wind on aircon fan speed 3 in room 608. Had to call frontdesk to request to change room again.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice room, service leaves much to be desired.
desc: Hotel was not accommodating of request for an early check-in despite informing them that I had an important phone call interview to make which requires a quiet environment ‚Äì they redirected me to the Coffee Bean at The Forum shopping mall instead, despite having informed them more than 2 weeks in advance. Had to liase with them through Traveloka platform several times which was a very frustrating experience, they told me I had to pay for an extra night in order to secure an early check-in due to hotel availability during the festive season. It was only the night before that they offered complimentary usage of the lounge, which by then was already too late as I had found alternate arrangements, and the availability of the lounge was NOT told to me before hand. Upon check-in,

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great staycation!
desc: Had a great 3D2N staycation with the family and they're all very lovely, especially Sofia from the front desk. Requested cakes for the family birthday celebration but they ran out and gave us chocolate instead. Booked two rooms I didn't do any advance request for rooms to be nearby but they very kindly accommodated to my request when I checked in. Rooms are huge for the price paid, and the swimming pool is pretty lovely. Breakfast was okay-ish but for the price paid, nothing much to complain about. Thanks Dixon, Tree and Samy for being so accommodating to a family member with wheelchair. Rest of staff from housekeeping to the pool people are very friendly, but the four mentioned above went beyond and truly made the stay enjoyable and very welcoming. My family had a wonderful

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Staycation, Excellent Staff Team
desc: Very impressed by the staff, Joyce at the counter - she is so friendly. I can see that she tried her best to see to our request because we have young kids. So it was a good start. The other was Patrick. I can see that he has a lot to do. But he did what he can even though we know our request is beyond him. That was in the afternoon. At 10pm, he was still there working and he remembered my request. Even though it was a 'no', I appreciate that he tried. Lastly, we met Clare at the staff lounge. She is so nice. She just made our day in the morning when we are there for our breakfast. She is so prompt when we needed something. The breakfast was okay (simple) but it was great because of her excellent service. She even sees us to the lift when we left. Others The

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service by this one service staff
desc: Food wasn't fantastic but service was. Our first breakfast on the first day and we were welcomed by this attentive, friendly, smiley and warm service staff - Sofia despite the place being filled with so many guests whom she had to serve.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Extremely pleasant stay with great staff!
desc: We had a really pleasant stay at this hotel. Front desk staff, Sofia, was highly attentive, professional with a warm personality. She graciously upgraded our room to a huge Suite Room. The room was very clean with friendly cleaning lady, and views from the balconies were lovely. There was ample parking space and walking distance to malls and MRT stations along Orchard Road. Breakfast was decent and service was prompt. Again the multi-talented Sofia was helping out with breakfast and National Cookies Day. Will definitely recommend this hotel to family and friends!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Old but gold
desc: Old looking interior but well maintained. Great location with many restaurants/convenience store nearby. Love the warm welcome and great hospitality from every staff! Kudos to that! Very smooth, professional and efficient checking in procedure. Beds are quite dated and you can feel it's abit worn down but it didn't bother me because it's clean. My family didn't break out in rashes as compared to some other hotels we've been to.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Chillax
desc: Great place to chillax. Did just that with my daughter for 3 dys 2 nights & had gd experience. Staff friendly & room clean. Location just nice to explore Orchard Road during Christmas season. Got to explore the beautiful lights along Orchard Road.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: J
desc: Great place for a staycation in Singapore! Location is conveniently situated in central. The best experience throughout was with the friendly and helpful staff. A big shout-out to John, Sofia, Joyce, Kamal and Patrick. Their customer service is outstanding especially kudos to John from the front desk! The free upgrade & ice-creams for the boys made our stay pleasantly memorable.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing customer service and room
desc: The service provided from pre check-in to check-in then to the room service was amazing. Initially I have booked the hotel through Klook not knowing that guests are not allowed and I was very worried that my sister 21st birthday surprise might not be able to continue, but the hotel team has gone the extra mile to help to find solutions and managed to allow us to top up to upgrade to a family bunk bed room and even included an extra bed for us even though the central booking team mention that no bigger rooms were available already. When we arrive to check-in, the team was also so friendly and did their best to help us ensure that we can check in as soon as the room was ready. The room service was also great, when our wifi was not working but the team sent up a technician to

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Spacious room
desc: Nice and spacious room. Great value for money. The room and bathroom were clean too. The staffs were all helpful and friendly. There is a long Q during chk-in and the staff manage it well. Location of the hotel is great as it is a walking distance to most malls and restaurants in Orchard road. Didnt get to experience the hotel dining but will definitely try when we come back again for our next staycation.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Outdated Hotel with Fresh paint! Reeks of cigarettes
desc: As mentioned in the post stay survey, i experienced strong cigarette stench in room 404 and 505! The lift buttons were absolutely horrific to operate, basically require many hard presses for it to work once. The technology behind this hotel seems to be from 1900s, and disguised behind fresh paint/look. Service however is good from attentive staff at reception and breakfast! I wished the company cared more about the facilities and hardware, so people can enjoy the stay! Bad staycation idea!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Spacious Rooms, Great Comfort @ Tanglin
desc: Massive rooms, good food and great service. I enjoyed using the gym and pool, and had a lovely time staying in the edge of Orchard and Tanglin which let me explore some of the Tanglin Road area. I was given a free upgrade so got lucky with the room - crisp linen, clean rooms and overall in very very pleased

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Service
desc: Staff very happy to do printing of documents for my flight home . Only 5min walk to station . Breakfast and cocktails in club lounge were excellent . Rooms were made to look new after maid did her cleaning of the room.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nil
desc: I was great experience staying at this hotel!! The service was super excellent.. and the room is super and the cleanliness of the room toilet is 10/10.. i would recommend this to family members and friends. Thank you for the great service.. i would like to rate its a 5 star.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Old hotel
desc: Unpleasant staycation. Went during Dec period. Before I went, I checked if I can book the pool slot. They say can only book upon check-in. As expected, after check-in, they say the slots are full. The only available slot is at 12pm the next day when we check out. Asked if can grant late check-out, since no other slots except 12pm. They did not grant flexibility and says cannot as they are full. Unpleasant stay for my child. Will not go again. The interiors are old too.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Spacious suite room and super clean
desc: Book the hotel for a birthday celebration and the staff was really helpful in assisting in receiving and sending the cake to the hotel room. Got a upgrade to a suite as well and the room was huge, The room was kept really clean as well. Would definitely visit again.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Overall good stay
desc: There is always room for improvement on the cleanness, specially areas not that no so much exposed to the public eyes. The front desk staff was friendly and willing to serve the guest, perhaps the hotel should look into have more staff during the check in and check out.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Big and Nice room
desc: I enjoyed my stay at the hotel. Check-in / out was fast. The room is big and nice. The location is perfect as it is near the malls in orchard. There are lots of restaurants/coffee shops near the hotel.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Love love love
desc: Had my stay here for 2 nights. Upon check-in, was greeted by the lovely staff Sofia who remembered me although its been awhile since I stayed there. Checking in was smooth and pleasant. Had the club suite room and it was wonderful, although i would recomthe toilet and shower area to be a bit bigger but nonetheless, everything else is good. Breakfast and evening cocktails time were smooth sailing and the food is delicious too. Many thanks to Sofia, Dickson and Lyla for making my stay here this time a more wonderful and pleasant experience. Would always look forward to staying here again.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staff who made it feel like home.
desc: Great location, great staff, who made it feel like 'home'. Nothing was too much trouble for them. Might need a refurb, but for convenience, cleanliness, safety during COVID, outstanding. Will definitely stay there again. Special shout out to Sofia, my breakfast hostess, and Mel, who can fix any computer/phone issues. The hairdressing salon was great too, for a well earned pamper without having to trek down Orchard Road.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: SHN
desc: The Hotel Supervisors are very friendly and approachable specially Mr John and Ms Nammi. They are very professional and ready to give extra mile to their guest. KUDOS to all staff of Orchard Rendezvous Hotel. Keep safe everyone!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Impeccable service
desc: My friend and I had a 3D2N (20-23Jan) stay to utilize our SRV and we had one of the best stays. We were welcomed by Sofia who provided us a late checkout and upgraded us to a King sized bed. Everything was amazing, service and hospitality was impeccable. The pool was great, room was spacious and clean. Looking forward to our next stay here.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: staycation
desc: When we checked in we were upgraded to a family room, 3 super-single beds, the room is nice but without view though with window, as it just a 1 night 2 days short vacation as. The receptionists were nice, helpful during our check-in. Thanks

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: Its like youre home in the middle of the city. With complete amenities and beautiful swimming pool. Spacious and quite, very accumodating and attentive to your needs. I will recommend this hotel to my friends and families as well.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Hotel with Great Hospitality & Service
desc: Had an Excellent and Memorable 2nd weekend Staycation. Excellent Service from all Staff, singling out Ms Sofia of the Front Desk who was pleasant, helpful, courteous, resourceful, attentive and had a lot of initiative thus making the Stay more pleasant and memorable. Hotel facilities are well kept, clean and tastefully done. Thank You for the Pleasant and Memorable Experience ! Highly Recommended to One and All. üí•üí•üí•üí•üí•

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service
desc: The hotel is located along orchard road which provide convenient for food and also shopping. The hotel staff that attending to me is friendly and provide excellent service. I was being upgrade to club room with balcony facing the pool

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Customer service on point with great view on their rooftop swimming pool.
desc: The staff are very friendly and an Intern (Andrew) help the check in process smoothly with great customer service. He tried his best to cater to his customer to his best of his ability and very welcoming. Not only that, When customer is in doubt he is very approachable and clarify any worry that you may have.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic Hotel and better staff
desc: Hotel very well located in the center of Singapore, and well connected through metro and bus. One can also walk to many places of interest going along the famous shopping street of Orchard Road. It is also very convenient to arrive from the airport with public transport. The hotel is very good! The room was very comfortable and clean with king size bed and a balcony with views to the wonderful swimming pool. But the best of the hotel is all the staff. They were very kind, polite and always helpful. Specially Sofia and Dixon were fantastic. They gave me a warm welcome to Singapore. I felt very well!! Thank you!!!

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: We‚Äôll positioned delightful hotel
desc: We had a beautiful spacious well equipped room. We thoroughly enjoyed our three night stay. The hotel is well situated and we walked to shopping malls, Raffles and other tourist attractions with ease. We did need a taxi to take us to the cruise terminal.

hotelname: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Happy staycation that was further enhanced by Staff's hospitality.
desc: We checked in on 22nd Jan for a one night staycation and was immensely impressed by the warm hospitality of your staff, particularly Sofia. There was no denying of her sincerity by her warm and patient response to the many questions that we had. I do have a rich experience in travelling, as well as staycations within SG and I am brimming with pride to share that Orchard Rendezvous has given me the best check in experience by far, even surpassing the "big names" in SG's hotel industry. Cleanliness and amenities are pretty impressive, but it is still the service from your staff that takes the cake.
